cobblemon.move.dragonascent.desc: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.
cobblemon.move.hyperspacefury.desc: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.
cobblemon.move.breakneckblitzphysical.de: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.alloutpummelingphysical.d: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.supersonicskystrikephysic: The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets toward the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.aciddownpourphysical.desc: The user creates a poisonous swamp using its Z-Power and sinks the target into it at full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.tectonicragephysical.desc: The user burrows deep into the ground and slams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.
The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.savagespinoutphysical.des: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.neverendingnightmarephysi: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user’s Z-Power trap the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.corkscrewcrashphysical.de: The user spins very fast and rams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.
The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.hydrovortexphysical.desc: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.bloomdoomphysical.desc: The user collects energy from plants using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.gigavolthavocphysical.des: The user hits the target with a powerful electric current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.shatteredpsychephysical.d: The user controls the target with its Z-Power and hurts the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.subzeroslammerphysical.de: The user dramatically drops the temperature using its Z-Power and freezes the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.twinkletacklephysical.des: The user creates a very charming space using its Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.catastropika.desc: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.
cobblemon.move.shoreup.desc: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.
cobblemon.move.firstimpression.desc: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.
cobblemon.move.banefulbunker.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.
cobblemon.move.spiritshackle.desc: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.
cobblemon.move.darkestlariat.desc: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.
cobblemon.move.sparklingaria.desc: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.
cobblemon.move.icehammer.desc: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.
cobblemon.move.floralhealing.desc: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.
cobblemon.move.highhorsepower.desc: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.
cobblemon.move.strengthsap.desc: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.solarblade.desc: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the target on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.leafage.desc: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.
cobblemon.move.spotlight.desc: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.
cobblemon.move.toxicthread.desc: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target’s Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.laserfocus.desc: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.
cobblemon.move.gearup.desc: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
cobblemon.move.throatchop.desc: The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns.
cobblemon.move.pollenpuff.desc: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
cobblemon.move.anchorshot.desc: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.
cobblemon.move.psychicterrain.desc: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.
cobblemon.move.lunge.desc: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.firelash.desc: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.powertrip.desc: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.
cobblemon.move.burnup.desc: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.
cobblemon.move.speedswap.desc: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.
cobblemon.move.smartstrike.desc: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.purify.desc: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.
cobblemon.move.revelationdance.desc: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.
cobblemon.move.coreenforcer.desc: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
cobblemon.move.tropkick.desc: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.instruct.desc: The user instructs the target to use the target’s last move again.
cobblemon.move.beakblast.desc: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it’s heating up its beak results in a burn.
cobblemon.move.clangingscales.desc: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.
cobblemon.move.dragonhammer.desc: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.
cobblemon.move.brutalswing.desc: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.
cobblemon.move.auroraveil.desc: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.
cobblemon.move.sinisterarrowraid.desc: The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows using its Z-Power and shoots the target with full force.
cobblemon.move.maliciousmoonsault.desc: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using its Z-Power and crashes into the target with full force.
cobblemon.move.oceanicoperetta.desc: The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of  water using its Z-Power and attacks the target with  full force.
cobblemon.move.guardianofalola.desc: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
cobblemon.move.soulstealing7starstrike.d: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow, punches and kicks the target consecutively with full force.
cobblemon.move.stokedsparksurfer.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu, attacks the target with full force. This move leaves the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.pulverizingpancake.desc: Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user, Snorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body energetically and attacks the target with full force.
cobblemon.move.extremeevoboost.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.
cobblemon.move.genesissupernova.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks the target with full force. The terrain will be charged with psychic energy.
cobblemon.move.shelltrap.desc: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.fleurcannon.desc: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.psychicfangs.desc: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.
cobblemon.move.stompingtantrum.desc: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.
cobblemon.move.shadowbone.desc: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.accelerock.desc: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.liquidation.desc: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.prismaticlaser.desc: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.spectralthief.desc: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.
cobblemon.move.sunsteelstrike.desc: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target  regardless of its Abilities.
cobblemon.move.moongeistbeam.desc: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of  its Abilities.
cobblemon.move.tearfullook.desc: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
cobblemon.move.zingzap.desc: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.naturesmadness.desc: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.
cobblemon.move.multiattack.desc: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move’s type.
cobblemon.move.10000000voltthunderbolt.d: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.mindblown.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.
cobblemon.move.plasmafists.desc: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.
cobblemon.move.photongeyser.desc: The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.
cobblemon.move.lightthatburnsthesky.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.searingsunrazesmash.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.menacingmoonrazemaelstrom: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.letssnuggleforever.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.splinteredstormshards.des: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.clangoroussoulblaze.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.zippyzap.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

cobblemon.move.pikapapow.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.bouncybubble.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.buzzybuzz.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.sizzlyslide.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.glitzyglow.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.baddybad.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.sappyseed.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.freezyfrost.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.sparklyswirl.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.veeveevolley.desc: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
cobblemon.move.doubleironbash.desc: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.maxguard.desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
cobblemon.move.dynamaxcannon.desc: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.
cobblemon.move.snipeshot.desc: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.
cobblemon.move.jawlock.desc: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.
cobblemon.move.stuffcheeks.desc: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.noretreat.desc: This move raises all the user’s stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.
cobblemon.move.tarshot.desc: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target’s Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.move.magicpowder.desc: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target to Psychic type.
cobblemon.move.dragondarts.desc: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.
cobblemon.move.teatime.desc: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.
cobblemon.move.octolock.desc: The user locks the target in and prevents it from fleeing. This move also lowers the target’s Defense and Sp. Def every turn.
cobblemon.move.boltbeak.desc: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.
cobblemon.move.fishiousrend.desc: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.
cobblemon.move.courtchange.desc: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.
cobblemon.move.maxflare.desc: This is a Fire-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user intensifies the sun for five turns.
cobblemon.move.maxflutterby.desc: This is a Bug-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.maxlightning.desc: This is an Electric-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns.
cobblemon.move.maxstrike.desc: This is a Normal-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.maxknuckle.desc: This is a Fighting-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Attack stats.
cobblemon.move.maxphantasm.desc: This is a Ghost-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.maxhailstorm.desc: This is an Ice-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.
cobblemon.move.maxooze.desc: This is a Poison-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stats.
cobblemon.move.maxgeyser.desc: This is a Water-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns.
cobblemon.move.maxairstream.desc: This is a Flying-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Speed stats.
cobblemon.move.maxstarfall.desc: This is a Fairy-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Misty Terrain for five turns.
cobblemon.move.maxwyrmwind.desc: This is a Dragon-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.maxmindstorm.desc: This is a Psychic-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Psychic Terrain for five turns.
cobblemon.move.maxrockfall.desc: This is a Rock-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a sandstorm lasting five turns.
cobblemon.move.maxquake.desc: This is a Ground-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Sp. Def stats.
cobblemon.move.maxdarkness.desc: This is a Dark-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.maxovergrowth.desc: This is a Grass-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns.
cobblemon.move.maxsteelspike.desc: This is a Steel-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Defense stats.
cobblemon.move.clangoroussoul.desc: The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.
cobblemon.move.bodypress.desc: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user’s Defense, the more damage it can inflict on the target.
cobblemon.move.decorate.desc: The user sharply raises the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.
cobblemon.move.drumbeating.desc: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum’s roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.snaptrap.desc: The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.pyroball.desc: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.behemothblade.desc: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.
cobblemon.move.behemothbash.desc: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.
cobblemon.move.aurawheel.desc: Morpeko attacks and raises its Speed with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move’s type changes depending on the user’s form.
cobblemon.move.breakingswipe.desc: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.
cobblemon.move.branchpoke.desc: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.
cobblemon.move.overdrive.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.
cobblemon.move.appleacid.desc: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.gravapple.desc: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.spiritbreak.desc: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target’s spirit. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.strangesteam.desc: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.
cobblemon.move.lifedew.desc: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.
cobblemon.move.obstruct.desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession. Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.falsesurrender.desc: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.meteorassault.desc: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can’t move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.
cobblemon.move.eternabeam.desc: This is Eternatus’s most powerful attack in its original form. The user can’t move on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.steelbeam.desc: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.
cobblemon.move.expandingforce.desc: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. This move’s power goes up and damages all opposing Pokémon on Psychic Terrain.
cobblemon.move.steelroller.desc: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails when the ground hasn’t turned into a terrain.
cobblemon.move.scaleshot.desc: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user’s Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.meteorbeam.desc: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks the target on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.shellsidearm.desc: This move inflicts physical or special damage, whichever will be more effective. This may also poison the target.
cobblemon.move.mistyexplosion.desc: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move’s power is increased on Misty Terrain.
cobblemon.move.grassyglide.desc: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.
cobblemon.move.risingvoltage.desc: The user attacks with electric voltage rising from the ground. This move’s power doubles when the target is on Electric Terrain.
cobblemon.move.terrainpulse.desc: The user utilizes the power of the terrain to attack. This move’s type and power changes depending on the terrain when it’s used.
cobblemon.move.skittersmack.desc: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.burningjealousy.desc: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.
cobblemon.move.lashout.desc: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. If the user’s stats were lowered during this turn, the power of this move is doubled.
cobblemon.move.poltergeist.desc: The user attacks the target by controlling the target’s item. The move fails if the target doesn’t have an item.
cobblemon.move.corrosivegas.desc: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.
cobblemon.move.coaching.desc: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.
cobblemon.move.flipturn.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
cobblemon.move.tripleaxel.desc: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.
cobblemon.move.dualwingbeat.desc: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.
cobblemon.move.scorchingsands.desc: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.junglehealing.desc: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and healing any status conditions of itself and its ally Pokémon in battle.
cobblemon.move.wickedblow.desc: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.
cobblemon.move.surgingstrikes.desc: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This attack always results in a critical hit.
cobblemon.move.thundercage.desc: The user traps the target in a cage of sparking electricity for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.dragonenergy.desc: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.
cobblemon.move.freezingglare.desc: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.
cobblemon.move.fierywrath.desc: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.
cobblemon.move.thunderouskick.desc: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.glaciallance.desc: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.astralbarrage.desc: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.eeriespell.desc: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also removes 3 PP from the target’s last move.
cobblemon.species.bulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
cobblemon.species.bulbasaur.desc1: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
cobblemon.species.ivysaur.name: Ivysaur
cobblemon.species.ivysaur.desc1: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
cobblemon.species.venusaur.name: Venusaur
cobblemon.species.venusaur.desc1: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
cobblemon.species.charmander.name: Charmander
cobblemon.species.charmander.desc1: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
cobblemon.species.charmeleon.name: Charmeleon
cobblemon.species.charmeleon.desc1: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to  unbearably high levels.
cobblemon.species.charizard.name: Charizard
cobblemon.species.charizard.desc1: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.
cobblemon.species.squirtle.name: Squirtle
cobblemon.species.squirtle.desc1: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It powerfully sprays foam  from its mouth.
cobblemon.species.wartortle.name: Wartortle
cobblemon.species.wartortle.desc1: It often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For fast swimming, it moves its ears to maintain balance.
cobblemon.species.blastoise.name: Blastoise
cobblemon.species.blastoise.desc1: The pressurized water jets on this brutal POKéMON’s shell are used for high- speed tackles.
cobblemon.species.caterpie.name: Caterpie
cobblemon.species.caterpie.desc1: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
cobblemon.species.metapod.name: Metapod
cobblemon.species.metapod.desc1: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
cobblemon.species.butterfree.name: Butterfree
cobblemon.species.butterfree.desc1: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
cobblemon.species.weedle.name: Weedle
cobblemon.species.weedle.desc1: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp stinger on its head that injects poison.
cobblemon.species.kakuna.name: Kakuna
cobblemon.species.kakuna.desc1: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.
cobblemon.species.beedrill.name: Beedrill
cobblemon.species.beedrill.desc1: It flies at high speed and attacks using  the large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
cobblemon.species.pidgey.name: Pidgey
cobblemon.species.pidgey.desc1: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
cobblemon.species.pidgeotto.name: Pidgeotto
cobblemon.species.pidgeotto.desc1: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.
cobblemon.species.pidgeot.name: Pidgeot
cobblemon.species.pidgeot.desc1: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.
cobblemon.species.rattata.name: Rattata
cobblemon.species.rattata.desc1: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
cobblemon.species.raticate.name: Raticate
cobblemon.species.raticate.desc1: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
cobblemon.species.spearow.name: Spearow
cobblemon.species.spearow.desc1: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
cobblemon.species.fearow.name: Fearow
cobblemon.species.fearow.desc1: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
cobblemon.species.ekans.name: Ekans
cobblemon.species.ekans.desc1: Moving silently and stealthily, it eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.
cobblemon.species.arbok.name: Arbok
cobblemon.species.arbok.desc1: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
cobblemon.species.pikachu.name: Pikachu
cobblemon.species.pikachu.desc1: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity can build and cause lightning storms.
cobblemon.species.raichu.name: Raichu
cobblemon.species.raichu.desc1: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.
cobblemon.species.sandshrew.name: Sandshrew
cobblemon.species.sandshrew.desc1: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for prey.
cobblemon.species.sandslash.name: Sandslash
cobblemon.species.sandslash.desc1: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
cobblemon.species.nidoranf.name: Nidoran♀
cobblemon.species.nidoranf.desc1: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
cobblemon.species.nidorina.name: Nidorina
cobblemon.species.nidorina.desc1: The female’s horns develop slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.
cobblemon.species.nidoqueen.name: Nidoqueen
cobblemon.species.nidoqueen.desc1: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
cobblemon.species.nidoranm.name: Nidoran♂
cobblemon.species.nidoranm.desc1: It stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more  powerful its secreted venom.
cobblemon.species.nidorino.name: Nidorino
cobblemon.species.nidorino.desc1: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
cobblemon.species.nidoking.name: Nidoking
cobblemon.species.nidoking.desc1: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey’s bones.
cobblemon.species.clefairy.name: Clefairy
cobblemon.species.clefairy.desc1: With its magical and cute appeal, it has  many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.
cobblemon.species.clefable.name: Clefable
cobblemon.species.clefable.desc1: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
cobblemon.species.vulpix.name: Vulpix
cobblemon.species.vulpix.desc1: When it is born, it has just one snow- white tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
cobblemon.species.ninetales.name: Ninetales
cobblemon.species.ninetales.desc1: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
cobblemon.species.jigglypuff.name: Jigglypuff
cobblemon.species.jigglypuff.desc1: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
cobblemon.species.wigglytuff.name: Wigglytuff
cobblemon.species.wigglytuff.desc1: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
cobblemon.species.zubat.name: Zubat
cobblemon.species.zubat.desc1: It forms colonies in perpetually dark  places and uses ultrasonic waves to   identify and approach targets.
cobblemon.species.golbat.name: Golbat
cobblemon.species.golbat.desc1: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
cobblemon.species.oddish.name: Oddish
cobblemon.species.oddish.desc1: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.
cobblemon.species.gloom.name: Gloom
cobblemon.species.gloom.desc1: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn’t drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.
cobblemon.species.vileplume.name: Vileplume
cobblemon.species.vileplume.desc1: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
cobblemon.species.paras.name: Paras
cobblemon.species.paras.desc1: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.
cobblemon.species.parasect.name: Parasect
cobblemon.species.parasect.desc1: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.
cobblemon.species.venonat.name: Venonat
cobblemon.species.venonat.desc1: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats bugs. It is attracted by light at night.
cobblemon.species.venomoth.name: Venomoth
cobblemon.species.venomoth.desc1: The dustlike scales covering its wings are color-coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.
cobblemon.species.diglett.name: Diglett
cobblemon.species.diglett.desc1: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.
cobblemon.species.dugtrio.name: Dugtrio
cobblemon.species.dugtrio.desc1: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
cobblemon.species.meowth.name: Meowth
cobblemon.species.meowth.desc1: Adores round objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
cobblemon.species.persian.name: Persian
cobblemon.species.persian.desc1: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
cobblemon.species.psyduck.name: Psyduck
cobblemon.species.psyduck.desc1: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.
cobblemon.species.golduck.name: Golduck
cobblemon.species.golduck.desc1: Often seen swimming elegantly by lakeshores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster Kappa.
cobblemon.species.mankey.name: Mankey
cobblemon.species.mankey.desc1: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment, then thrashing away  the next instant.
cobblemon.species.primeape.name: Primeape
cobblemon.species.primeape.desc1: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it catches up.
cobblemon.species.growlithe.name: Growlithe
cobblemon.species.growlithe.desc1: It is very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.
cobblemon.species.arcanine.name: Arcanine
cobblemon.species.arcanine.desc1: A POKéMON that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
cobblemon.species.poliwag.name: Poliwag
cobblemon.species.poliwag.desc1: Its newly grown legs prevent it from walking well. It appears to prefer swimming over walking.
cobblemon.species.poliwhirl.name: Poliwhirl
cobblemon.species.poliwhirl.desc1: It can live in or out of water. When out of water, it constantly sweats to keep its body slimy.
cobblemon.species.poliwrath.name: Poliwrath
cobblemon.species.poliwrath.desc1: A swimmer adept at both the front crawl and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.
cobblemon.species.abra.name: Abra
cobblemon.species.abra.desc1: Using its ability to read minds, it will sense impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.
cobblemon.species.kadabra.name: Kadabra
cobblemon.species.kadabra.desc1: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close.
cobblemon.species.alakazam.name: Alakazam
cobblemon.species.alakazam.desc1: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its IQ (intelligence quotient) is said to be around 5,000.
cobblemon.species.machop.name: Machop
cobblemon.species.machop.desc1: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.
cobblemon.species.machoke.name: Machoke
cobblemon.species.machoke.desc1: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
cobblemon.species.machamp.name: Machamp
cobblemon.species.machamp.desc1: Its superpowerful punches are said to knock the victim flying clear over the horizon.
cobblemon.species.bellsprout.name: Bellsprout
cobblemon.species.bellsprout.desc1: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It appears to use its root feet to replenish moisture.
cobblemon.species.weepinbell.name: Weepinbell
cobblemon.species.weepinbell.desc1: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.
cobblemon.species.victreebel.name: Victreebel
cobblemon.species.victreebel.desc1: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.
cobblemon.species.tentacool.name: Tentacool
cobblemon.species.tentacool.desc1: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by their stingers.
cobblemon.species.tentacruel.name: Tentacruel
cobblemon.species.tentacruel.desc1: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
cobblemon.species.geodude.name: Geodude
cobblemon.species.geodude.desc1: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
cobblemon.species.graveler.name: Graveler
cobblemon.species.graveler.desc1: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.
cobblemon.species.golem.name: Golem
cobblemon.species.golem.desc1: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without taking damage.
cobblemon.species.ponyta.name: Ponyta
cobblemon.species.ponyta.desc1: Its hooves are ten times harder than diamond. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.
cobblemon.species.rapidash.name: Rapidash
cobblemon.species.rapidash.desc1: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
cobblemon.species.slowpoke.name: Slowpoke
cobblemon.species.slowpoke.desc1: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes five seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.
cobblemon.species.slowbro.name: Slowbro
cobblemon.species.slowbro.desc1: The SHELLDER that latches onto SLOWPOKE’s tail is said to feed on the host’s leftover scraps.
cobblemon.species.magnemite.name: Magnemite
cobblemon.species.magnemite.desc1: Uses antigravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.
cobblemon.species.magneton.name: Magneton
cobblemon.species.magneton.desc1: Formed by several MAGNEMITE linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.
cobblemon.species.farfetchd.name: Farfetch’d
cobblemon.species.farfetchd.desc1: The plant stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.
cobblemon.species.doduo.name: Doduo
cobblemon.species.doduo.desc1: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.
cobblemon.species.dodrio.name: Dodrio
cobblemon.species.dodrio.desc1: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head is said to stay awake.
cobblemon.species.seel.name: Seel
cobblemon.species.seel.desc1: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick icebergs.
cobblemon.species.dewgong.name: Dewgong
cobblemon.species.dewgong.desc1: It stores thermal energy in the body. It swims at a steady eight knots even in intensely cold waters.
cobblemon.species.grimer.name: Grimer
cobblemon.species.grimer.desc1: Appears in filthy areas. It thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
cobblemon.species.muk.name: Muk
cobblemon.species.muk.desc1: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
cobblemon.species.shellder.name: Shellder
cobblemon.species.shellder.desc1: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
cobblemon.species.cloyster.name: Cloyster
cobblemon.species.cloyster.desc1: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.
cobblemon.species.gastly.name: Gastly
cobblemon.species.gastly.desc1: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.
cobblemon.species.haunter.name: Haunter
cobblemon.species.haunter.desc1: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.
cobblemon.species.gengar.name: Gengar
cobblemon.species.gengar.desc1: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be GENGAR’s doing.
cobblemon.species.onix.name: Onix
cobblemon.species.onix.desc1: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to black-colored diamonds.
cobblemon.species.drowzee.name: Drowzee
cobblemon.species.drowzee.desc1: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.
cobblemon.species.hypno.name: Hypno
cobblemon.species.hypno.desc1: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.
cobblemon.species.krabby.name: Krabby
cobblemon.species.krabby.desc1: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.
cobblemon.species.kingler.name: Kingler
cobblemon.species.kingler.desc1: The large pincer has 10,000-horsepower crushing force. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.
cobblemon.species.voltorb.name: Voltorb
cobblemon.species.voltorb.desc1: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, it has zapped many people.
cobblemon.species.electrode.name: Electrode
cobblemon.species.electrode.desc1: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.
cobblemon.species.exeggcute.name: Exeggcute
cobblemon.species.exeggcute.desc1: It is often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.
cobblemon.species.exeggutor.name: Exeggutor
cobblemon.species.exeggutor.desc1: It is said that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.
cobblemon.species.cubone.name: Cubone
cobblemon.species.cubone.desc1: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON’s real face.
cobblemon.species.marowak.name: Marowak
cobblemon.species.marowak.desc1: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
cobblemon.species.hitmonlee.name: Hitmonlee
cobblemon.species.hitmonlee.desc1: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra-long, loping strides.
cobblemon.species.hitmonchan.name: Hitmonchan
cobblemon.species.hitmonchan.desc1: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning-fast volleys that are impossible to see.
cobblemon.species.lickitung.name: Lickitung
cobblemon.species.lickitung.desc1: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon’s. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.
cobblemon.species.koffing.name: Koffing
cobblemon.species.koffing.desc1: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.
cobblemon.species.weezing.name: Weezing
cobblemon.species.weezing.desc1: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, two KOFFING can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.
cobblemon.species.rhyhorn.name: Rhyhorn
cobblemon.species.rhyhorn.desc1: Its massive bones are 1,000 times harder than human bones. Its TACKLE can knock a semitrailer flying.
cobblemon.species.rhydon.name: Rhydon
cobblemon.species.rhydon.desc1: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.chansey.name: Chansey
cobblemon.species.chansey.desc1: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to catch one.
cobblemon.species.tangela.name: Tangela
cobblemon.species.tangela.desc1: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. The vines sway as it walks.
cobblemon.species.kangaskhan.name: Kangaskhan
cobblemon.species.kangaskhan.desc1: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother’s protective pouch until it is three years old.
cobblemon.species.horsea.name: Horsea
cobblemon.species.horsea.desc1: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.
cobblemon.species.seadra.name: Seadra
cobblemon.species.seadra.desc1: It is capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its winglike pectoral fins and stout tail.
cobblemon.species.goldeen.name: Goldeen
cobblemon.species.goldeen.desc1: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of “The Water Queen.”
cobblemon.species.seaking.name: Seaking
cobblemon.species.seaking.desc1: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.
cobblemon.species.staryu.name: Staryu
cobblemon.species.staryu.desc1: An enigmatic POKéMON that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.
cobblemon.species.starmie.name: Starmie
cobblemon.species.starmie.desc1: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
cobblemon.species.mrmime.name: Mr. Mime
cobblemon.species.mrmime.desc1: If interrupted while it is miming, it will suddenly DOUBLESLAP the offender with its broad hands.
cobblemon.species.scyther.name: Scyther
cobblemon.species.scyther.desc1: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one of itself.
cobblemon.species.jynx.name: Jynx
cobblemon.species.jynx.desc1: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
cobblemon.species.electabuzz.name: Electabuzz
cobblemon.species.electabuzz.desc1: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.
cobblemon.species.magmar.name: Magmar
cobblemon.species.magmar.desc1: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly amidst flames.
cobblemon.species.pinsir.name: Pinsir
cobblemon.species.pinsir.desc1: If it fails to crush the foe in its pincers, it will swing around and toss the opponent.
cobblemon.species.tauros.name: Tauros
cobblemon.species.tauros.desc1: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.
cobblemon.species.magikarp.name: Magikarp
cobblemon.species.magikarp.desc1: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
cobblemon.species.gyarados.name: Gyarados
cobblemon.species.gyarados.desc1: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
cobblemon.species.lapras.name: Lapras
cobblemon.species.lapras.desc1: A POKéMON that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people on its back.
cobblemon.species.ditto.name: Ditto
cobblemon.species.ditto.desc1: Capable of copying an opponent’s genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.
cobblemon.species.eevee.name: Eevee
cobblemon.species.eevee.desc1: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONES.
cobblemon.species.vaporeon.name: Vaporeon
cobblemon.species.vaporeon.desc1: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid’s.
cobblemon.species.jolteon.name: Jolteon
cobblemon.species.jolteon.desc1: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.
cobblemon.species.flareon.name: Flareon
cobblemon.species.flareon.desc1: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature can soar to over 1,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.porygon.name: Porygon
cobblemon.species.porygon.desc1: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. It is capable of moving freely in cyberspace.
cobblemon.species.omanyte.name: Omanyte
cobblemon.species.omanyte.desc1: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically regenerated from fossils.
cobblemon.species.omastar.name: Omastar
cobblemon.species.omastar.desc1: Despite having strong fangs and tentacles, it went extinct when its heavy shell made it unable to catch prey.
cobblemon.species.kabuto.name: Kabuto
cobblemon.species.kabuto.desc1: A POKéMON that was regenerated from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor long ago.
cobblemon.species.kabutops.name: Kabutops
cobblemon.species.kabutops.desc1: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains their fluids.
cobblemon.species.aerodactyl.name: Aerodactyl
cobblemon.species.aerodactyl.desc1: A ferocious, prehistoric POKéMON that goes for the enemy’s throat with its serrated, sawlike fangs.
cobblemon.species.snorlax.name: Snorlax
cobblemon.species.snorlax.desc1: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.
cobblemon.species.articuno.name: Articuno
cobblemon.species.articuno.desc1: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.
cobblemon.species.zapdos.name: Zapdos
cobblemon.species.zapdos.desc1: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
cobblemon.species.moltres.name: Moltres
cobblemon.species.moltres.desc1: It is said to be the legendary bird POKéMON of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare of flames.
cobblemon.species.dratini.name: Dratini
cobblemon.species.dratini.desc1: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently, when a small colony was found living underwater.
cobblemon.species.dragonair.name: Dragonair
cobblemon.species.dragonair.desc1: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. It is said to have the ability to change the weather.
cobblemon.species.dragonite.name: Dragonite
cobblemon.species.dragonite.desc1: Only a very few people ever see this POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.
cobblemon.species.mewtwo.name: Mewtwo
cobblemon.species.mewtwo.desc1: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA- engineering experiments.
cobblemon.species.mew.name: Mew
cobblemon.species.mew.desc1: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
cobblemon.species.chikorita.name: Chikorita
cobblemon.species.chikorita.desc1: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up the sun’s rays.
cobblemon.species.bayleef.name: Bayleef
cobblemon.species.bayleef.desc1: The scent of spices comes from around its neck. Somehow, sniffing it makes you want to fight.
cobblemon.species.meganium.name: Meganium
cobblemon.species.meganium.desc1: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.
cobblemon.species.cyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
cobblemon.species.cyndaquil.desc1: It is timid and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.
cobblemon.species.quilava.name: Quilava
cobblemon.species.quilava.desc1: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. It means that it will attack with the fire on its back.
cobblemon.species.typhlosion.name: Typhlosion
cobblemon.species.typhlosion.desc1: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.
cobblemon.species.totodile.name: Totodile
cobblemon.species.totodile.desc1: Its well-developed jaws are powerful and capable of crushing anything. Even its TRAINER must be careful.
cobblemon.species.croconaw.name: Croconaw
cobblemon.species.croconaw.desc1: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.
cobblemon.species.feraligatr.name: Feraligatr
cobblemon.species.feraligatr.desc1: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears up its victim.
cobblemon.species.sentret.name: Sentret
cobblemon.species.sentret.desc1: A very cautious POKéMON, it raises itself up using its tail to get a better view of its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.furret.name: Furret
cobblemon.species.furret.desc1: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other POKéMON to enter.
cobblemon.species.hoothoot.name: Hoothoot
cobblemon.species.hoothoot.desc1: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.
cobblemon.species.noctowl.name: Noctowl
cobblemon.species.noctowl.desc1: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.
cobblemon.species.ledyba.name: Ledyba
cobblemon.species.ledyba.desc1: It is very timid. It will be afraid to move if it is alone. But it will be active if it is in a group.
cobblemon.species.ledian.name: Ledian
cobblemon.species.ledian.desc1: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
cobblemon.species.spinarak.name: Spinarak
cobblemon.species.spinarak.desc1: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
cobblemon.species.ariados.name: Ariados
cobblemon.species.ariados.desc1: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It is hard to tell which end is which.
cobblemon.species.crobat.name: Crobat
cobblemon.species.crobat.desc1: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
cobblemon.species.chinchou.name: Chinchou
cobblemon.species.chinchou.desc1: It shoots positive and negative electricity between the tips of its two antennae and zaps its enemies.
cobblemon.species.lanturn.name: Lanturn
cobblemon.species.lanturn.desc1: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea’s surface from a depth of over three miles.
cobblemon.species.pichu.name: Pichu
cobblemon.species.pichu.desc1: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
cobblemon.species.cleffa.name: Cleffa
cobblemon.species.cleffa.desc1: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
cobblemon.species.igglybuff.name: Igglybuff
cobblemon.species.igglybuff.desc1: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.
cobblemon.species.togepi.name: Togepi
cobblemon.species.togepi.desc1: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
cobblemon.species.togetic.name: Togetic
cobblemon.species.togetic.desc1: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.
cobblemon.species.natu.name: Natu
cobblemon.species.natu.desc1: Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.
cobblemon.species.xatu.name: Xatu
cobblemon.species.xatu.desc1: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
cobblemon.species.mareep.name: Mareep
cobblemon.species.mareep.desc1: If static electricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.
cobblemon.species.flaaffy.name: Flaaffy
cobblemon.species.flaaffy.desc1: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won’t grow.
cobblemon.species.ampharos.name: Ampharos
cobblemon.species.ampharos.desc1: The tail’s tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.
cobblemon.species.bellossom.name: Bellossom
cobblemon.species.bellossom.desc1: BELLOSSOM gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
cobblemon.species.marill.name: Marill
cobblemon.species.marill.desc1: The tip of its tail, which contains oil that is lighter than water, lets it swim without drowning.
cobblemon.species.azumarill.name: Azumarill
cobblemon.species.azumarill.desc1: By keeping still and listening intently, it can even tell what is in wild, fast-moving rivers.
cobblemon.species.sudowoodo.name: Sudowoodo
cobblemon.species.sudowoodo.desc1: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears to be closer to a rock than a plant.
cobblemon.species.politoed.name: Politoed
cobblemon.species.politoed.desc1: If POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.
cobblemon.species.hoppip.name: Hoppip
cobblemon.species.hoppip.desc1: To keep from being blown away by the wind, they gather in clusters. They do enjoy gentle breezes, though.
cobblemon.species.skiploom.name: Skiploom
cobblemon.species.skiploom.desc1: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.
cobblemon.species.jumpluff.name: Jumpluff
cobblemon.species.jumpluff.desc1: Once it catches the wind, it deftly controls its cotton-puff spores to float, even around the world.
cobblemon.species.aipom.name: Aipom
cobblemon.species.aipom.desc1: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.
cobblemon.species.sunkern.name: Sunkern
cobblemon.species.sunkern.desc1: It may drop out of the sky suddenly. If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will violently shake its leaves.
cobblemon.species.sunflora.name: Sunflora
cobblemon.species.sunflora.desc1: It converts sunlight into energy. In the darkness after sunset, it closes its petals and becomes still.
cobblemon.species.yanma.name: Yanma
cobblemon.species.yanma.desc1: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.
cobblemon.species.wooper.name: Wooper
cobblemon.species.wooper.desc1: This POKéMON lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
cobblemon.species.quagsire.name: Quagsire
cobblemon.species.quagsire.desc1: This carefree POKéMON has an easygoing nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.
cobblemon.species.espeon.name: Espeon
cobblemon.species.espeon.desc1: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its enemy’s actions.
cobblemon.species.umbreon.name: Umbreon
cobblemon.species.umbreon.desc1: When agitated, this POKéMON protects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.
cobblemon.species.murkrow.name: Murkrow
cobblemon.species.murkrow.desc1: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.
cobblemon.species.slowking.name: Slowking
cobblemon.species.slowking.desc1: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
cobblemon.species.misdreavus.name: Misdreavus
cobblemon.species.misdreavus.desc1: It likes playing mischievous tricks such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.
cobblemon.species.unown.name: Unown
cobblemon.species.unown.desc1: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
cobblemon.species.wobbuffet.name: Wobbuffet
cobblemon.species.wobbuffet.desc1: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.
cobblemon.species.girafarig.name: Girafarig
cobblemon.species.girafarig.desc1: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent and bite.
cobblemon.species.pineco.name: Pineco
cobblemon.species.pineco.desc1: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The extra weight doesn’t bother it.
cobblemon.species.forretress.name: Forretress
cobblemon.species.forretress.desc1: Its entire body is shielded by a steel- hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.
cobblemon.species.dunsparce.name: Dunsparce
cobblemon.species.dunsparce.desc1: When spotted, this POKéMON escapes backward by furiously boring into the ground with its tail.
cobblemon.species.gligar.name: Gligar
cobblemon.species.gligar.desc1: It flies straight at its target’s face, then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.
cobblemon.species.steelix.name: Steelix
cobblemon.species.steelix.desc1: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than diamond.
cobblemon.species.snubbull.name: Snubbull
cobblemon.species.snubbull.desc1: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.
cobblemon.species.granbull.name: Granbull
cobblemon.species.granbull.desc1: It is actually timid and easily spooked. If attacked, it flails about to fend off its attacker.
cobblemon.species.qwilfish.name: Qwilfish
cobblemon.species.qwilfish.desc1: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of  water all at once.
cobblemon.species.scizor.name: Scizor
cobblemon.species.scizor.desc1: It swings its eye-patterned pincers up to scare its foes. This makes it look like it has three heads.
cobblemon.species.shuckle.name: Shuckle
cobblemon.species.shuckle.desc1: The BERRIES it stores in its vaselike shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.
cobblemon.species.heracross.name: Heracross
cobblemon.species.heracross.desc1: This powerful POKéMON thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies, then lifts and throws them.
cobblemon.species.sneasel.name: Sneasel
cobblemon.species.sneasel.desc1: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.
cobblemon.species.teddiursa.name: Teddiursa
cobblemon.species.teddiursa.desc1: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they are soaked with honey.
cobblemon.species.ursaring.name: Ursaring
cobblemon.species.ursaring.desc1: Although it is a good climber, it prefers to snap stout trees with its forelegs and eat fallen BERRIES.
cobblemon.species.slugma.name: Slugma
cobblemon.species.slugma.desc1: It never sleeps. It has to keep moving because if it stopped, its magma body would cool and harden.
cobblemon.species.magcargo.name: Magcargo
cobblemon.species.magcargo.desc1: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. It breaks easily with a slight touch.
cobblemon.species.swinub.name: Swinub
cobblemon.species.swinub.desc1: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
cobblemon.species.piloswine.name: Piloswine
cobblemon.species.piloswine.desc1: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
cobblemon.species.corsola.name: Corsola
cobblemon.species.corsola.desc1: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.
cobblemon.species.remoraid.name: Remoraid
cobblemon.species.remoraid.desc1: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike even moving prey from more than 100 yards.
cobblemon.species.octillery.name: Octillery
cobblemon.species.octillery.desc1: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
cobblemon.species.delibird.name: Delibird
cobblemon.species.delibird.desc1: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.
cobblemon.species.mantine.name: Mantine
cobblemon.species.mantine.desc1: As it majestically swims, it doesn’t care if REMORAID attach to it to scavenge for its leftovers.
cobblemon.species.skarmory.name: Skarmory
cobblemon.species.skarmory.desc1: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but its bones are hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
cobblemon.species.houndour.name: Houndour
cobblemon.species.houndour.desc1: It uses different kinds of cries for communicating with others of its kind and for pursuing prey.
cobblemon.species.houndoom.name: Houndoom
cobblemon.species.houndoom.desc1: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.
cobblemon.species.kingdra.name: Kingdra
cobblemon.species.kingdra.desc1: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.
cobblemon.species.phanpy.name: Phanpy
cobblemon.species.phanpy.desc1: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, this can be dangerous.
cobblemon.species.donphan.name: Donphan
cobblemon.species.donphan.desc1: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough to knock down a house.
cobblemon.species.porygon2.name: Porygon2
cobblemon.species.porygon2.desc1: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. However, it can’t even fly.
cobblemon.species.stantler.name: Stantler
cobblemon.species.stantler.desc1: Its curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.
cobblemon.species.smeargle.name: Smeargle
cobblemon.species.smeargle.desc1: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
cobblemon.species.tyrogue.name: Tyrogue
cobblemon.species.tyrogue.desc1: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
cobblemon.species.hitmontop.name: Hitmontop
cobblemon.species.hitmontop.desc1: If you become enchanted by its smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get drilled hard.
cobblemon.species.smoochum.name: Smoochum
cobblemon.species.smoochum.desc1: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
cobblemon.species.elekid.name: Elekid
cobblemon.species.elekid.desc1: It rotates its arms to generate electricity, but it tires easily, so it charges up only a little bit.
cobblemon.species.magby.name: Magby
cobblemon.species.magby.desc1: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.
cobblemon.species.miltank.name: Miltank
cobblemon.species.miltank.desc1: Its milk is packed with nutrition, making it the ultimate beverage for the sick or weary.
cobblemon.species.blissey.name: Blissey
cobblemon.species.blissey.desc1: Anyone who takes even one bite of BLISSEY’s egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone.
cobblemon.species.raikou.name: Raikou
cobblemon.species.raikou.desc1: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.
cobblemon.species.entei.name: Entei
cobblemon.species.entei.desc1: Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Unable to restrain its extreme power, it races headlong around the land.
cobblemon.species.suicune.name: Suicune
cobblemon.species.suicune.desc1: Said to be the reincarnation of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.
cobblemon.species.larvitar.name: Larvitar
cobblemon.species.larvitar.desc1: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it will fall asleep so it can grow.
cobblemon.species.pupitar.name: Pupitar
cobblemon.species.pupitar.desc1: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. Its THRASHING can topple a mountain.
cobblemon.species.tyranitar.name: Tyranitar
cobblemon.species.tyranitar.desc1: Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.
cobblemon.species.lugia.name: Lugia
cobblemon.species.lugia.desc1: It is said that it quietly spends its time deep at the bottom of the sea because its powers are too strong.
cobblemon.species.hooh.name: Ho-Oh
cobblemon.species.hooh.desc1: Legends claim this POKéMON flies the world’s skies continuously on its magnificent seven-colored wings.
cobblemon.species.celebi.name: Celebi
cobblemon.species.celebi.desc1: This POKéMON wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
cobblemon.species.treecko.name: Treecko
cobblemon.species.treecko.desc1: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day’s weather.
cobblemon.species.grovyle.name: Grovyle
cobblemon.species.grovyle.desc1: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.
cobblemon.species.sceptile.name: Sceptile
cobblemon.species.sceptile.desc1: The leaves on its forelegs are as sharp as swords. It agilely leaps about the branches of trees to strike.
cobblemon.species.torchic.name: Torchic
cobblemon.species.torchic.desc1: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.
cobblemon.species.combusken.name: Combusken
cobblemon.species.combusken.desc1: It boosts its concentration by emitting harsh cries. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.
cobblemon.species.blaziken.name: Blaziken
cobblemon.species.blaziken.desc1: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.
cobblemon.species.mudkip.name: Mudkip
cobblemon.species.mudkip.desc1: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.
cobblemon.species.marshtomp.name: Marshtomp
cobblemon.species.marshtomp.desc1: It is at its best when on muddy ground with poor footing. It quickly overwhelms foes struggling in mud.
cobblemon.species.swampert.name: Swampert
cobblemon.species.swampert.desc1: Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing, they can batter down its foe. It makes its nest on beautiful beaches.
cobblemon.species.poochyena.name: Poochyena
cobblemon.species.poochyena.desc1: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.
cobblemon.species.mightyena.name: Mightyena
cobblemon.species.mightyena.desc1: It will always obey the commands of a skilled TRAINER. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
cobblemon.species.zigzagoon.name: Zigzagoon
cobblemon.species.zigzagoon.desc1: A POKéMON with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigs and zags.
cobblemon.species.linoone.name: Linoone
cobblemon.species.linoone.desc1: When running in a straight line, it can top 60 miles per hour. However, it has a tough time with curved roads.
cobblemon.species.wurmple.name: Wurmple
cobblemon.species.wurmple.desc1: It lives amidst tall grass and in forests. When attacked, it resists by pointing its venomous spikes at the foe.
cobblemon.species.silcoon.name: Silcoon
cobblemon.species.silcoon.desc1: It conserves its energy by moving as little as possible. It awaits evolution while drinking only a little rainwater.
cobblemon.species.beautifly.name: Beautifly
cobblemon.species.beautifly.desc1: Despite its appearance, it has an aggressive nature. It attacks by jabbing with its long, thin mouth.
cobblemon.species.cascoon.name: Cascoon
cobblemon.species.cascoon.desc1: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
cobblemon.species.dustox.name: Dustox
cobblemon.species.dustox.desc1: It scatters horribly toxic dust when it senses danger. They tend to gather in the glow of streetlamps at night.
cobblemon.species.lotad.name: Lotad
cobblemon.species.lotad.desc1: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.
cobblemon.species.lombre.name: Lombre
cobblemon.species.lombre.desc1: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.
cobblemon.species.ludicolo.name: Ludicolo
cobblemon.species.ludicolo.desc1: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates LUDICOLO’s cells, making it more powerful.
cobblemon.species.seedot.name: Seedot
cobblemon.species.seedot.desc1: If it remains still, it becomes impossible to distinguish from real nuts. It delights in surprising foraging PIDGEY.
cobblemon.species.nuzleaf.name: Nuzleaf
cobblemon.species.nuzleaf.desc1: They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound of NUZLEAF’s grass flute fills listeners with dread.
cobblemon.species.shiftry.name: Shiftry
cobblemon.species.shiftry.desc1: A POKéMON that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.
cobblemon.species.taillow.name: Taillow
cobblemon.species.taillow.desc1: It dislikes cold seasons. They migrate to other lands in search of warmth, flying over 180 miles a day.
cobblemon.species.swellow.name: Swellow
cobblemon.species.swellow.desc1: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.
cobblemon.species.wingull.name: Wingull
cobblemon.species.wingull.desc1: It rides upon ocean winds as if it were a glider. In the winter, it hides food around its nest.
cobblemon.species.pelipper.name: Pelipper
cobblemon.species.pelipper.desc1: It is a flying transporter that carries small POKéMON in its beak. It bobs on the waves to rest its wings.
cobblemon.species.ralts.name: Ralts
cobblemon.species.ralts.desc1: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and POKéMON. It hides if it senses hostility.
cobblemon.species.kirlia.name: Kirlia
cobblemon.species.kirlia.desc1: The cheerful spirit of its TRAINER gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.
cobblemon.species.gardevoir.name: Gardevoir
cobblemon.species.gardevoir.desc1: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its TRAINER.
cobblemon.species.surskit.name: Surskit
cobblemon.species.surskit.desc1: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
cobblemon.species.masquerain.name: Masquerain
cobblemon.species.masquerain.desc1: The antennae have distinctive patterns that look like eyes. When it rains, they grow heavy, making flight impossible.
cobblemon.species.shroomish.name: Shroomish
cobblemon.species.shroomish.desc1: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.
cobblemon.species.breloom.name: Breloom
cobblemon.species.breloom.desc1: The seeds on its tail are made of toxic spores. It knocks out foes with quick, virtually invisible punches.
cobblemon.species.slakoth.name: Slakoth
cobblemon.species.slakoth.desc1: It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Making drowsy those that see it is one of its abilities.
cobblemon.species.vigoroth.name: Vigoroth
cobblemon.species.vigoroth.desc1: It is always hungry because it won’t stop rampaging. Even while it is eating, it can’t keep still.
cobblemon.species.slaking.name: Slaking
cobblemon.species.slaking.desc1: It is the world’s most slothful POKéMON. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.
cobblemon.species.nincada.name: Nincada
cobblemon.species.nincada.desc1: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
cobblemon.species.ninjask.name: Ninjask
cobblemon.species.ninjask.desc1: This POKéMON is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.
cobblemon.species.shedinja.name: Shedinja
cobblemon.species.shedinja.desc1: A most peculiar POKéMON that somehow appears in a POKé BALL when a NINCADA evolves.
cobblemon.species.whismur.name: Whismur
cobblemon.species.whismur.desc1: It usually murmurs, but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.
cobblemon.species.loudred.name: Loudred
cobblemon.species.loudred.desc1: When it stamps its feet and bellows, it generates ultrasonic waves that can blow apart a house.
cobblemon.species.exploud.name: Exploud
cobblemon.species.exploud.desc1: It emits a variety of sounds from the  holes all over its body. Its loud cries can be heard from over six miles away.
cobblemon.species.makuhita.name: Makuhita
cobblemon.species.makuhita.desc1: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy POKéMON that can withstand any attack.
cobblemon.species.hariyama.name: Hariyama
cobblemon.species.hariyama.desc1: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.
cobblemon.species.azurill.name: Azurill
cobblemon.species.azurill.desc1: It battles by flinging around its tail, which is bigger than its body. The tail is a flotation device in water.
cobblemon.species.nosepass.name: Nosepass
cobblemon.species.nosepass.desc1: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travelers check NOSEPASS to get their bearings.
cobblemon.species.skitty.name: Skitty
cobblemon.species.skitty.desc1: It is said to be difficult to earn its trust. However, it is extremely popular for its cute looks and behavior.
cobblemon.species.delcatty.name: Delcatty
cobblemon.species.delcatty.desc1: The favorite of trend-conscious female TRAINERS, they are used in competition for their style and fur.
cobblemon.species.sableye.name: Sableye
cobblemon.species.sableye.desc1: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.
cobblemon.species.mawile.name: Mawile
cobblemon.species.mawile.desc1: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
cobblemon.species.aron.name: Aron
cobblemon.species.aron.desc1: It eats iron to build its steel body. It is a pest that descends from mountains to eat bridges and train tracks.
cobblemon.species.lairon.name: Lairon
cobblemon.species.lairon.desc1: It habitually shows off its strength with the size of sparks it creates by ramming its steel body into boulders.
cobblemon.species.aggron.name: Aggron
