cobblemon.species.aggron.desc1: It claims a large mountain as its sole territory. It mercilessly thrashes those that violate its space.
cobblemon.species.meditite.name: Meditite
cobblemon.species.meditite.desc1: It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens its inner strength through meditation.
cobblemon.species.medicham.name: Medicham
cobblemon.species.medicham.desc1: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance- like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.
cobblemon.species.electrike.name: Electrike
cobblemon.species.electrike.desc1: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.
cobblemon.species.manectric.name: Manectric
cobblemon.species.manectric.desc1: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
cobblemon.species.plusle.name: Plusle
cobblemon.species.plusle.desc1: It cheers on partners while scattering sparks from its body. It climbs telephone poles to absorb electricity.
cobblemon.species.minun.name: Minun
cobblemon.species.minun.desc1: Its dislike of water makes it take shelter under the eaves of houses in rain. It uses pom-poms made of sparks for cheering.
cobblemon.species.volbeat.name: Volbeat
cobblemon.species.volbeat.desc1: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.
cobblemon.species.illumise.name: Illumise
cobblemon.species.illumise.desc1: It guides VOLBEAT to draw signs in night skies. There are scientists that study the patterns it creates.
cobblemon.species.roselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.roselia.desc1: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the ROSELIA is.
cobblemon.species.gulpin.name: Gulpin
cobblemon.species.gulpin.desc1: There is nothing its stomach can’t digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.
cobblemon.species.swalot.name: Swalot
cobblemon.species.swalot.desc1: It can swallow a tire whole in one gulp. It secretes a horribly toxic fluid from the pores on its body.
cobblemon.species.carvanha.name: Carvanha
cobblemon.species.carvanha.desc1: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.
cobblemon.species.sharpedo.name: Sharpedo
cobblemon.species.sharpedo.desc1: The ruffian of the seas, it has fangs that crunch through iron. It swims by jetting water from its rear.
cobblemon.species.wailmer.name: Wailmer
cobblemon.species.wailmer.desc1: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.
cobblemon.species.wailord.name: Wailord
cobblemon.species.wailord.desc1: It is among the largest of all POKéMON. It herds prey in a pack then swallows the massed prey in one gulp.
cobblemon.species.numel.name: Numel
cobblemon.species.numel.desc1: Magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. When it grows cold, the magma hardens and slows it.
cobblemon.species.camerupt.name: Camerupt
cobblemon.species.camerupt.desc1: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.
cobblemon.species.torkoal.name: Torkoal
cobblemon.species.torkoal.desc1: It burns coal inside its shell. If it is attacked, it belches thick, black smoke and flees.
cobblemon.species.spoink.name: Spoink
cobblemon.species.spoink.desc1: It apparently dies if it stops bouncing about. It carries a pearl from CLAMPERL on its head.
cobblemon.species.grumpig.name: Grumpig
cobblemon.species.grumpig.desc1: It can gain control over foes by doing odd dance steps. The black pearls on its forehead are precious gems.
cobblemon.species.spinda.name: Spinda
cobblemon.species.spinda.desc1: No two SPINDA are said to have identical patterns. It confuses foes with its stumbling motions.
cobblemon.species.trapinch.name: Trapinch
cobblemon.species.trapinch.desc1: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.
cobblemon.species.vibrava.name: Vibrava
cobblemon.species.vibrava.desc1: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the prey with acid.
cobblemon.species.flygon.name: Flygon
cobblemon.species.flygon.desc1: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.
cobblemon.species.cacnea.name: Cacnea
cobblemon.species.cacnea.desc1: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.
cobblemon.species.cacturne.name: Cacturne
cobblemon.species.cacturne.desc1: It lives in deserts. It becomes active at night when it hunts for prey exhausted from the desert’s heat.
cobblemon.species.swablu.name: Swablu
cobblemon.species.swablu.desc1: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
cobblemon.species.altaria.name: Altaria
cobblemon.species.altaria.desc1: If you hear a beautiful melody trilling deep among mountains far from people, it is ALTARIA’s humming.
cobblemon.species.zangoose.name: Zangoose
cobblemon.species.zangoose.desc1: If it comes across a SEVIPER, its fur bristles and it assumes its battle pose. Its sharp claws are its best weapon.
cobblemon.species.seviper.name: Seviper
cobblemon.species.seviper.desc1: It sharpens its swordlike tail on hard rocks. It hides in tall grass and strikes unwary prey with venomous fangs.
cobblemon.species.lunatone.name: Lunatone
cobblemon.species.lunatone.desc1: Its health ebbs and flows with the lunar cycle. It brims with power when exposed to the light of the full moon.
cobblemon.species.solrock.name: Solrock
cobblemon.species.solrock.desc1: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.
cobblemon.species.barboach.name: Barboach
cobblemon.species.barboach.desc1: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.
cobblemon.species.whiscash.name: Whiscash
cobblemon.species.whiscash.desc1: It makes its nest at the bottom of  swamps. It will eat anything - if it is alive, WHISCASH will eat it.
cobblemon.species.corphish.name: Corphish
cobblemon.species.corphish.desc1: It came from overseas. It is a very hardy creature that will quickly proliferate, even in polluted streams.
cobblemon.species.crawdaunt.name: Crawdaunt
cobblemon.species.crawdaunt.desc1: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.
cobblemon.species.baltoy.name: Baltoy
cobblemon.species.baltoy.desc1: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.
cobblemon.species.claydol.name: Claydol
cobblemon.species.claydol.desc1: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
cobblemon.species.lileep.name: Lileep
cobblemon.species.lileep.desc1: It became extinct roughly 100 million years ago. It was regenerated from a fossil using advanced techniques.
cobblemon.species.cradily.name: Cradily
cobblemon.species.cradily.desc1: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.
cobblemon.species.anorith.name: Anorith
cobblemon.species.anorith.desc1: It is a kind of POKéMON progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.
cobblemon.species.armaldo.name: Armaldo
cobblemon.species.armaldo.desc1: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.
cobblemon.species.feebas.name: Feebas
cobblemon.species.feebas.desc1: Ridiculed for its shabby appearance, it is ignored by researchers. It lives in ponds choked with weeds.
cobblemon.species.milotic.name: Milotic
cobblemon.species.milotic.desc1: MILOTIC is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
cobblemon.species.castform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.castform.desc1: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud,  depending on the weather.
cobblemon.species.kecleon.name: Kecleon
cobblemon.species.kecleon.desc1: It changes body color to blend in with its surroundings. It also changes color if it is happy or sad.
cobblemon.species.shuppet.name: Shuppet
cobblemon.species.shuppet.desc1: It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people.
cobblemon.species.banette.name: Banette
cobblemon.species.banette.desc1: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a POKéMON. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.
cobblemon.species.duskull.name: Duskull
cobblemon.species.duskull.desc1: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.
cobblemon.species.dusclops.name: Dusclops
cobblemon.species.dusclops.desc1: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.
cobblemon.species.tropius.name: Tropius
cobblemon.species.tropius.desc1: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.
cobblemon.species.chimecho.name: Chimecho
cobblemon.species.chimecho.desc1: It travels by riding on winds. It cleverly uses its long tail to pluck nuts and berries, which it loves to eat.
cobblemon.species.absol.name: Absol
cobblemon.species.absol.desc1: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom-bringer.
cobblemon.species.wynaut.name: Wynaut
cobblemon.species.wynaut.desc1: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
cobblemon.species.snorunt.name: Snorunt
cobblemon.species.snorunt.desc1: It is said that a home visited by a SNORUNT will prosper. It can withstand cold of minus 150 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.glalie.name: Glalie
cobblemon.species.glalie.desc1: It has a body of ice that won’t melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.
cobblemon.species.spheal.name: Spheal
cobblemon.species.spheal.desc1: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.
cobblemon.species.sealeo.name: Sealeo
cobblemon.species.sealeo.desc1: It touches new things with its nose to test for smell and feel. It plays by spinning SPHEAL on its nose.
cobblemon.species.walrein.name: Walrein
cobblemon.species.walrein.desc1: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. It is protected by its thick blubber.
cobblemon.species.clamperl.name: Clamperl
cobblemon.species.clamperl.desc1: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.
cobblemon.species.huntail.name: Huntail
cobblemon.species.huntail.desc1: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.
cobblemon.species.gorebyss.name: Gorebyss
cobblemon.species.gorebyss.desc1: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.
cobblemon.species.relicanth.name: Relicanth
cobblemon.species.relicanth.desc1: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
cobblemon.species.luvdisc.name: Luvdisc
cobblemon.species.luvdisc.desc1: During the spawning season, countless LUVDISC congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.
cobblemon.species.bagon.name: Bagon
cobblemon.species.bagon.desc1: Its steel-hard head can shatter boulders. It longingly hopes for wings to grow so it can fly.
cobblemon.species.shelgon.name: Shelgon
cobblemon.species.shelgon.desc1: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.
cobblemon.species.salamence.name: Salamence
cobblemon.species.salamence.desc1: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
cobblemon.species.beldum.name: Beldum
cobblemon.species.beldum.desc1: It uses magnetic waves to converse with its kind. All the cells in its body are magnetic.
cobblemon.species.metang.name: Metang
cobblemon.species.metang.desc1: It floats midair using magnetism. Its body is so tough, even a crash with a jet plane won’t leave a scratch.
cobblemon.species.metagross.name: Metagross
cobblemon.species.metagross.desc1: It is formed by two METANG fusing. Its four brains are said to be superior to a supercomputer.
cobblemon.species.regirock.name: Regirock
cobblemon.species.regirock.desc1: It is entirely composed of rocks with no sign of a brain or heart. It is a mystery even to modern scientists.
cobblemon.species.regice.name: Regice
cobblemon.species.regice.desc1: Research revealed that its body is made of the same kind of ice that is found at the South Pole.
cobblemon.species.registeel.name: Registeel
cobblemon.species.registeel.desc1: It is sturdier than any kind of metal. It hardened due to pressure underground over tens of thousands of years.
cobblemon.species.latias.name: Latias
cobblemon.species.latias.desc1: It can telepathically communicate with people. It changes its appearance using its down that refracts light.
cobblemon.species.latios.name: Latios
cobblemon.species.latios.desc1: It has a docile temperament and dislikes fighting. Tucking in its forelegs, it can fly faster than a jet plane.
cobblemon.species.kyogre.name: Kyogre
cobblemon.species.kyogre.desc1: This POKéMON is said to have expanded the sea by bringing heavy rains. It has the power to control water.
cobblemon.species.groudon.name: Groudon
cobblemon.species.groudon.desc1: This legendary POKéMON is said to represent the land. It went to sleep after dueling KYOGRE.
cobblemon.species.rayquaza.name: Rayquaza
cobblemon.species.rayquaza.desc1: It has lived for hundreds of millions of years in the ozone layer. Its flying form looks like a meteor.
cobblemon.species.jirachi.name: Jirachi
cobblemon.species.jirachi.desc1: It is said to make any wish come true. It is awake for only seven days out of a thousand years.
cobblemon.species.deoxys.name: Deoxys
cobblemon.species.deoxys.desc1: When it changes form, an aurora appears. It absorbs attacks by altering its cellular structure.
cobblemon.species.turtwig.name: Turtwig
cobblemon.species.grotle.name: Grotle
cobblemon.species.torterra.name: Torterra
cobblemon.species.chimchar.name: Chimchar
cobblemon.species.monferno.name: Monferno
cobblemon.species.infernape.name: Infernape
cobblemon.species.piplup.name: Piplup
cobblemon.species.prinplup.name: Prinplup
cobblemon.species.empoleon.name: Empoleon
cobblemon.species.starly.name: Starly
cobblemon.species.staravia.name: Staravia
cobblemon.species.staraptor.name: Staraptor
cobblemon.species.bidoof.name: Bidoof
cobblemon.species.bibarel.name: Bibarel
cobblemon.species.kricketot.name: Kricketot
cobblemon.species.kricketune.name: Kricketune
cobblemon.species.shinx.name: Shinx
cobblemon.species.shinx.desc1: This Pokémon generates electricity by contracting its muscles. Excited trembling is a sign that Shinx is generating a tremendous amount of electricity.
cobblemon.species.luxio.name: Luxio
cobblemon.species.luxio.desc1: By joining its tail with that of another Luxio, this Pokémon can receive some of the other Luxio’s electricity and power up its own electric blasts.
cobblemon.species.luxray.name: Luxray
cobblemon.species.luxray.desc1: Luxray can see through solid objects. It will instantly spot prey trying to hide behind walls, even if the walls are thick.
cobblemon.species.budew.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.budew.desc1: The pollen it releases contains poison. If this Pokémon is raised on clean water, the poison’s toxicity is increased.
cobblemon.species.roserade.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.roserade.desc1: After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.
cobblemon.species.cranidos.name: Cranidos
cobblemon.species.rampardos.name: Rampardos
cobblemon.species.shieldon.name: Shieldon
cobblemon.species.bastiodon.name: Bastiodon
cobblemon.species.burmy.name: Burmy
cobblemon.species.wormadam.name: Wormadam
cobblemon.species.mothim.name: Mothim
cobblemon.species.combee.name: Combee
cobblemon.species.combee.desc1: The members of the trio spend all their time together. Each one has a slightly different taste in nectar.
cobblemon.species.vespiquen.name: Vespiquen
cobblemon.species.vespiquen.desc1: It skillfully commands its grubs in battles with its enemies. The grubs are willing to risk their lives to defend Vespiquen.
cobblemon.species.pachirisu.name: Pachirisu
cobblemon.species.buizel.name: Buizel
cobblemon.species.floatzel.name: Floatzel
cobblemon.species.cherubi.name: Cherubi
cobblemon.species.cherubi.desc1: It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked by bird Pokémon that would love to make off with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.
cobblemon.species.cherrim.name: Cherrim
cobblemon.species.cherrim.desc1: As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still, placidly waiting for sunlight to appear.
cobblemon.species.shellos.name: Shellos
cobblemon.species.shellos.desc1: This Pokémon’s habitat shapes its physique. According to some theories, life in warm ocean waters causes this variation to develop.
cobblemon.species.gastrodon.name: Gastrodon
cobblemon.species.gastrodon.desc1: Its search for food sometimes leads it onto land, where it leaves behind a sticky trail of slime as it passes through.
cobblemon.species.ambipom.name: Ambipom
cobblemon.species.drifloon.name: Drifloon
cobblemon.species.drifloon.desc1: Perhaps seeking company, it approaches children. However, it often quickly runs away again when the children play too roughly with it.
cobblemon.species.drifblim.name: Drifblim
cobblemon.species.drifblim.desc1: Some say this Pokémon is a collection of souls burdened with regrets, silently drifting through the dusk.
cobblemon.species.buneary.name: Buneary
cobblemon.species.buneary.desc1: If both of Buneary’s ears are rolled up, something is wrong with its body or mind. It’s a sure sign the Pokémon is in need of care.
cobblemon.species.lopunny.name: Lopunny
cobblemon.species.lopunny.desc1: Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings. If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds with superdestructive kicks.
cobblemon.species.mismagius.name: Mismagius
cobblemon.species.honchkrow.name: Honchkrow
cobblemon.species.glameow.name: Glameow
cobblemon.species.purugly.name: Purugly
cobblemon.species.chingling.name: Chingling
cobblemon.species.stunky.name: Stunky
cobblemon.species.stunky.desc1: From its rear, it sprays a foul-smelling liquid at opponents. It aims for their faces, and it can hit them from over 16 feet away.
cobblemon.species.skuntank.name: Skuntank
cobblemon.species.skuntank.desc1: In its belly, it reserves stinky fluid that it shoots from its tail during battle. As this Pokémon’s diet varies, so does the stench of its fluid.
cobblemon.species.bronzor.name: Bronzor
cobblemon.species.bronzor.desc1: It appears in ancient ruins. The pattern on its body doesn’t come from any culture in the Galar region, so it remains shrouded in mystery.
cobblemon.species.bronzong.name: Bronzong
cobblemon.species.bronzong.desc1: Some believe it to be a deity that summons rain clouds. When angered, it lets out a warning cry that rings out like the tolling of a bell.
cobblemon.species.bonsly.name: Bonsly
cobblemon.species.bonsly.desc1: It expels both sweat and tears from its eyes. The sweat is a little salty, while the tears have a slight bitterness.
cobblemon.species.mimejr.name: Mime Jr.
cobblemon.species.mimejr.desc1: It mimics everyone it sees, but it puts extra effort into copying the graceful dance steps of Mr. Rime as practice.
cobblemon.species.happiny.name: Happiny
cobblemon.species.happiny.desc1: Mimicking Chansey, Happiny will place an egg- shaped stone in its belly pouch. Happiny will treasure this stone.
cobblemon.species.chatot.name: Chatot
cobblemon.species.spiritomb.name: Spiritomb
cobblemon.species.spiritomb.desc1: Exactly 108 spirits gathered to become this Pokémon. Apparently there are some ill-natured spirits in the mix.
cobblemon.species.gible.name: Gible
cobblemon.species.gible.desc1: Gible prefers to stay in narrow holes in the sides of caves heated by geothermal energy. This way, Gible can stay warm even during a blizzard.
cobblemon.species.gabite.name: Gabite
cobblemon.species.gabite.desc1: This Pokémon emits ultrasonic waves from a protrusion on either side of its head to probe pitch-dark caves.
cobblemon.species.garchomp.name: Garchomp
cobblemon.species.garchomp.desc1: Garchomp makes its home in volcanic mountains. It flies through the sky as fast as a jet airplane, hunting down as much prey as it can.
cobblemon.species.munchlax.name: Munchlax
cobblemon.species.munchlax.desc1: Stuffing itself with vast amounts of food is its only concern. Whether the food is rotten or fresh, yummy or tasteless—it does not care.
cobblemon.species.riolu.name: Riolu
cobblemon.species.riolu.desc1: It’s exceedingly energetic, with enough stamina to keep running all through the night. Taking it for walks can be a challenging experience.
cobblemon.species.lucario.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.lucario.desc1: It controls waves known as auras, which are powerful enough to pulverize huge rocks. It uses these waves to take down its prey.
cobblemon.species.hippopotas.name: Hippopotas
cobblemon.species.hippopotas.desc1: It moves through the sands with its mouth open, swallowing sand along with its prey. It gets rid of the sand by spouting it from its nose.
cobblemon.species.hippowdon.name: Hippowdon
cobblemon.species.hippowdon.desc1: Stones can get stuck in the ports on their bodies. Dwebble help dislodge such stones, so Hippowdon look after these Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.skorupi.name: Skorupi
cobblemon.species.skorupi.desc1: After burrowing into the sand, it waits patiently for prey to come near. This Pokémon and Sizzlipede share common descent.
cobblemon.species.drapion.name: Drapion
cobblemon.species.drapion.desc1: Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees use. This Pokémon prefers to use physical force instead, going on rampages with its car-crushing strength.
cobblemon.species.croagunk.name: Croagunk
cobblemon.species.croagunk.desc1: It makes frightening noises with its poison-filled cheek sacs. When opponents flinch, Croagunk hits them with a poison jab.
cobblemon.species.toxicroak.name: Toxicroak
cobblemon.species.toxicroak.desc1: It bounces toward opponents and gouges them with poisonous claws. No more than a scratch is needed to knock out its adversaries.
cobblemon.species.carnivine.name: Carnivine
cobblemon.species.finneon.name: Finneon
cobblemon.species.lumineon.name: Lumineon
cobblemon.species.mantyke.name: Mantyke
cobblemon.species.mantyke.desc1: Mantyke living in Galar seem to be somewhat sluggish. The colder waters of the seas in this region may be the cause.
cobblemon.species.snover.name: Snover
cobblemon.species.snover.desc1: It lives on snowy mountains. It sinks its legs into the snow to absorb water and keep its own temperature down.
cobblemon.species.abomasnow.name: Abomasnow
cobblemon.species.abomasnow.desc1: If it sees any packs of Darumaka going after Snover, it chases them off, swinging its sizable arms like hammers.
cobblemon.species.weavile.name: Weavile
cobblemon.species.weavile.desc1: They attack their quarry in packs. Prey as large as Mamoswine easily fall to the teamwork of a group of Weavile.
cobblemon.species.magnezone.name: Magnezone
cobblemon.species.magnezone.desc1: Some say that Magnezone receives signals from space via the antenna on its head and that it’s being controlled by some mysterious being.
cobblemon.species.lickilicky.name: Lickilicky
cobblemon.species.lickilicky.desc1: Lickilicky’s strange tongue can stretch to many times the length of its body. No one has figured out how Lickilicky’s tongue can stretch so far.
cobblemon.species.rhyperior.name: Rhyperior
cobblemon.species.rhyperior.desc1: It can load up to three projectiles per arm into the holes in its hands. What launches out of those holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.
cobblemon.species.tangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.tangrowth.desc1: Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it pleases. Recent research has shown that these arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.
cobblemon.species.electivire.name: Electivire
cobblemon.species.electivire.desc1: The amount of electrical energy this Pokémon produces is proportional to the rate of its pulse. The voltage jumps while Electivire is battling.
cobblemon.species.magmortar.name: Magmortar
cobblemon.species.magmortar.desc1: When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.togekiss.name: Togekiss
cobblemon.species.togekiss.desc1: These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they’ve hardly been seen at all.
cobblemon.species.yanmega.name: Yanmega
cobblemon.species.leafeon.name: Leafeon
cobblemon.species.leafeon.desc1: Galarians favor the distinctive aroma that drifts from this Pokémon’s leaves. There’s a popular perfume made using that scent.
cobblemon.species.glaceon.name: Glaceon
cobblemon.species.glaceon.desc1: Any who become captivated by the beauty of the snowfall that Glaceon creates will be frozen before they know it.
cobblemon.species.gliscor.name: Gliscor
cobblemon.species.mamoswine.name: Mamoswine
cobblemon.species.mamoswine.desc1: This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a while, it was thought to have gone extinct.
cobblemon.species.porygonz.name: Porygon-Z
cobblemon.species.porygonz.desc1: Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to move between dimensions, but the program also caused instability in Porygon-Z’s behavior.
cobblemon.species.gallade.name: Gallade
cobblemon.species.gallade.desc1: True to its honorable-warrior image, it uses the blades on its elbows only in defense of something or someone.
cobblemon.species.probopass.name: Probopass
cobblemon.species.dusknoir.name: Dusknoir
cobblemon.species.dusknoir.desc1: At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit world, it steals people and Pokémon away. No one knows whether it has a will of its own.
cobblemon.species.froslass.name: Froslass
cobblemon.species.froslass.desc1: After a woman met her end on a snowy mountain, her regrets lingered on. From them, this Pokémon was born. Its favorite food is frozen souls.
cobblemon.species.rotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.rotom.desc1: One boy’s invention led to the development of many different machines that take advantage of Rotom’s unique capabilities.
cobblemon.species.uxie.name: Uxie
cobblemon.species.mesprit.name: Mesprit
cobblemon.species.azelf.name: Azelf
cobblemon.species.dialga.name: Dialga
cobblemon.species.palkia.name: Palkia
cobblemon.species.heatran.name: Heatran
cobblemon.species.regigigas.name: Regigigas
cobblemon.species.regigigas.desc1: All over the world, there are legends that tell of Regigigas creating other Pokémon in its own image.
cobblemon.species.giratina.name: Giratina
cobblemon.species.cresselia.name: Cresselia
cobblemon.species.phione.name: Phione
cobblemon.species.manaphy.name: Manaphy
cobblemon.species.darkrai.name: Darkrai
cobblemon.species.shaymin.name: Shaymin
cobblemon.species.arceus.name: Arceus
cobblemon.species.victini.name: Victini
cobblemon.species.snivy.name: Snivy
cobblemon.species.servine.name: Servine
cobblemon.species.serperior.name: Serperior
cobblemon.species.tepig.name: Tepig
cobblemon.species.pignite.name: Pignite
cobblemon.species.emboar.name: Emboar
cobblemon.species.oshawott.name: Oshawott
cobblemon.species.dewott.name: Dewott
cobblemon.species.samurott.name: Samurott
cobblemon.species.patrat.name: Patrat
cobblemon.species.watchog.name: Watchog
cobblemon.species.lillipup.name: Lillipup
cobblemon.species.lillipup.desc1: This Pokémon is courageous but also cautious. It uses the soft fur covering its face to collect information about its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.herdier.name: Herdier
cobblemon.species.herdier.desc1: Herdier is a very smart and friendly Pokémon. So much so that there’s a theory that Herdier was the first Pokémon to partner with people.
cobblemon.species.stoutland.name: Stoutland
cobblemon.species.stoutland.desc1: These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with humans. Even a Stoutland caught in the wild will warm up to people in about three days.
cobblemon.species.purrloin.name: Purrloin
cobblemon.species.purrloin.desc1: It steals things from people just to amuse itself with their frustration. A rivalry exists between this Pokémon and Nickit.
cobblemon.species.liepard.name: Liepard
cobblemon.species.liepard.desc1: Don’t be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.pansage.name: Pansage
cobblemon.species.simisage.name: Simisage
cobblemon.species.pansear.name: Pansear
cobblemon.species.simisear.name: Simisear
cobblemon.species.panpour.name: Panpour
cobblemon.species.simipour.name: Simipour
cobblemon.species.munna.name: Munna
cobblemon.species.munna.desc1: Late at night, it appears beside people’s pillows. As it feeds on dreams, the patterns on its body give off a faint glow.
cobblemon.species.musharna.name: Musharna
cobblemon.species.musharna.desc1: When dark mists emanate from its body, don’t get too near. If you do, your nightmares will become reality.
cobblemon.species.pidove.name: Pidove
cobblemon.species.pidove.desc1: Where people go, these Pokémon follow. If you’re scattering food for them, be careful— several hundred of them can gather at once.
cobblemon.species.tranquill.name: Tranquill
cobblemon.species.tranquill.desc1: It can fly moderately quickly. No matter how far it travels, it can always find its way back to its master and its nest.
cobblemon.species.unfezant.name: Unfezant
cobblemon.species.unfezant.desc1: Unfezant are exceptional fliers. The females are known for their stamina, while the males outclass them in terms of speed.
cobblemon.species.blitzle.name: Blitzle
cobblemon.species.zebstrika.name: Zebstrika
cobblemon.species.roggenrola.name: Roggenrola
cobblemon.species.roggenrola.desc1: It’s as hard as steel, but apparently a long soak in water will cause it to soften a bit.
cobblemon.species.boldore.name: Boldore
cobblemon.species.boldore.desc1: If you see its orange crystals start to glow, be wary. It’s about to fire off bursts of energy.
cobblemon.species.gigalith.name: Gigalith
cobblemon.species.gigalith.desc1: This hardy Pokémon can often be found on construction sites and in mines, working alongside people and Copperajah.
cobblemon.species.woobat.name: Woobat
cobblemon.species.woobat.desc1: While inside a cave, if you look up and see lots of heart-shaped marks lining the walls, it’s evidence that Woobat live there.
cobblemon.species.swoobat.name: Swoobat
cobblemon.species.swoobat.desc1: Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out. Afterward, it won’t be able to fly for a little while.
cobblemon.species.drilbur.name: Drilbur
cobblemon.species.drilbur.desc1: It brings its claws together and whirls around at high speed before rushing toward its prey.
cobblemon.species.excadrill.name: Excadrill
cobblemon.species.excadrill.desc1: It’s not uncommon for tunnels that appear to have formed naturally to actually be a result of Excadrill’s rampant digging.
cobblemon.species.audino.name: Audino
cobblemon.species.audino.desc1: Audino’s sense of hearing is superb. Not even a pebble rolling along over a mile away will escape Audino’s ears.
cobblemon.species.timburr.name: Timburr
cobblemon.species.timburr.desc1: It loves helping out with construction projects. It loves it so much that if rain causes work to halt, it swings its log around and throws a tantrum.
cobblemon.species.gurdurr.name: Gurdurr
cobblemon.species.gurdurr.desc1: It shows off its muscles to Machoke and other Gurdurr. If it fails to measure up to the other Pokémon, it lies low for a little while.
cobblemon.species.conkeldurr.name: Conkeldurr
cobblemon.species.conkeldurr.desc1: Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much more durable than normal concrete, even when the compositions of the two materials are the same.
cobblemon.species.tympole.name: Tympole
cobblemon.species.tympole.desc1: Graceful ripples running across the water’s surface are a sure sign that Tympole are singing in high-pitched voices below.
cobblemon.species.palpitoad.name: Palpitoad
cobblemon.species.palpitoad.desc1: It weakens its prey with sound waves intense enough to cause headaches, then entangles them with its sticky tongue.
cobblemon.species.seismitoad.name: Seismitoad
cobblemon.species.seismitoad.desc1: The vibrating of the bumps all over its body causes earthquake-like tremors. Seismitoad and Croagunk are similar species.
cobblemon.species.throh.name: Throh
cobblemon.species.throh.desc1: It performs throwing moves with first-rate skill. Over the course of many battles, Throh’s belt grows darker as it absorbs its wearer’s sweat.
cobblemon.species.sawk.name: Sawk
cobblemon.species.sawk.desc1: If you see a Sawk training in the mountains in its single-minded pursuit of strength, it’s best to quietly pass by.
cobblemon.species.sewaddle.name: Sewaddle
cobblemon.species.swadloon.name: Swadloon
cobblemon.species.leavanny.name: Leavanny
cobblemon.species.venipede.name: Venipede
cobblemon.species.venipede.desc1: Venipede and Sizzlipede are similar species, but when the two meet, a huge fight ensues.
cobblemon.species.whirlipede.name: Whirlipede
cobblemon.species.whirlipede.desc1: This Pokémon spins itself rapidly and charges into its opponents. Its top speed is just over 60 mph.
cobblemon.species.scolipede.name: Scolipede
cobblemon.species.scolipede.desc1: Scolipede latches on to its prey with the claws on its neck before slamming them into the ground and jabbing them with its claws’ toxic spikes.
cobblemon.species.cottonee.name: Cottonee
cobblemon.species.cottonee.desc1: It shoots cotton from its body to protect itself. If it gets caught up in hurricane-strength winds, it can get sent to the other side of the Earth.
cobblemon.species.whimsicott.name: Whimsicott
cobblemon.species.whimsicott.desc1: It scatters cotton all over the place as a prank. If it gets wet, it’ll become too heavy to move and have no choice but to answer for its mischief.
cobblemon.species.petilil.name: Petilil
cobblemon.species.petilil.desc1: Petilil appears around sources of clean water. Boiling leaves from this Pokémon’s head results in a liquid that’s sometimes used as a bug repellent.
cobblemon.species.lilligant.name: Lilligant
cobblemon.species.lilligant.desc1: It’s believed that even first-rate gardeners have a hard time getting the flower on a Lilligant’s head to bloom.
cobblemon.species.basculin.name: Basculin
cobblemon.species.basculin.desc1: Anglers love the fight this Pokémon puts up on the hook. And there are always more to catch— many people release them into lakes illicitly.
cobblemon.species.sandile.name: Sandile
cobblemon.species.sandile.desc1: The desert gets cold at night, so when the sun sets, this Pokémon burrows deep into the sand and sleeps until sunrise.
cobblemon.species.krokorok.name: Krokorok
cobblemon.species.krokorok.desc1: Krokorok has specialized eyes that enable it to see in the dark. This ability lets Krokorok hunt in the dead of night without getting lost.
cobblemon.species.krookodile.name: Krookodile
cobblemon.species.krookodile.desc1: This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sands. Krookodile’s mighty jaws can bite through heavy plates of iron with almost no effort at all.
cobblemon.species.darumaka.name: Darumaka
cobblemon.species.darumaka.desc1: It derives its power from fire burning inside its body. If the fire dwindles, this Pokémon will immediately fall asleep.
cobblemon.species.darmanitan.name: Darmanitan
cobblemon.species.darmanitan.desc1: The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokémon can deliver punches capable of obliterating a dump truck.
cobblemon.species.maractus.name: Maractus
cobblemon.species.maractus.desc1: With noises that could be mistaken for the rattles of maracas, it creates an upbeat rhythm, startling bird Pokémon and making them fly off in a hurry.
cobblemon.species.dwebble.name: Dwebble
cobblemon.species.dwebble.desc1: When it finds a stone appealing, it creates a hole inside it and uses it as its home. This Pokémon is the natural enemy of Roggenrola and Rolycoly.
cobblemon.species.crustle.name: Crustle
cobblemon.species.crustle.desc1: This highly territorial Pokémon prefers dry climates. It won’t come out of its boulder on rainy days.
cobblemon.species.scraggy.name: Scraggy
cobblemon.species.scraggy.desc1: If it locks eyes with you, watch out! Nothing and no one is safe from the reckless headbutts of this troublesome Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.scrafty.name: Scrafty
cobblemon.species.scrafty.desc1: As halfhearted as this Pokémon’s kicks may seem, they pack enough power to shatter Conkeldurr’s concrete pillars.
cobblemon.species.sigilyph.name: Sigilyph
cobblemon.species.sigilyph.desc1: Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fly. Some say they were the guardians of an ancient city. Others say they were the guardians’ emissaries.
cobblemon.species.yamask.name: Yamask
cobblemon.species.yamask.desc1: It wanders through ruins by night, carrying a mask that’s said to have been the face it had when it was still human.
cobblemon.species.cofagrigus.name: Cofagrigus
cobblemon.species.cofagrigus.desc1: This Pokémon has a body of sparkling gold. People say it no longer remembers that it was once human.
cobblemon.species.tirtouga.name: Tirtouga
cobblemon.species.tirtouga.desc1: This Pokémon inhabited ancient seas. Although it can only crawl, it still comes up onto land in search of prey.
cobblemon.species.carracosta.name: Carracosta
cobblemon.species.carracosta.desc1: Carracosta completely devours its prey—bones, shells, and all. Because of this, Carracosta’s own shell grows thick and sturdy.
cobblemon.species.archen.name: Archen
cobblemon.species.archen.desc1: This Pokémon was successfully restored from a fossil. As research suggested, Archen is unable to fly. But it’s very good at jumping.
cobblemon.species.archeops.name: Archeops
cobblemon.species.archeops.desc1: It needs a running start to take off. If Archeops wants to fly, it first needs to run nearly 25 mph, building speed over a course of about 2.5 miles.
cobblemon.species.trubbish.name: Trubbish
cobblemon.species.trubbish.desc1: Its favorite places are unsanitary ones. If you leave trash lying around, you could even find one of these Pokémon living in your room.
cobblemon.species.garbodor.name: Garbodor
cobblemon.species.garbodor.desc1: This Pokémon eats trash, which turns into poison inside its body. The main component of the poison depends on what sort of trash was eaten.
cobblemon.species.zorua.name: Zorua
cobblemon.species.zorua.desc1: Zorua is a timid Pokémon. This disposition seems to be what led to the development of Zorua’s ability to take on the forms of other creatures.
cobblemon.species.zoroark.name: Zoroark
cobblemon.species.zoroark.desc1: This Pokémon cares deeply about others of its kind, and it will conjure terrifying illusions to keep its den and pack safe.
cobblemon.species.minccino.name: Minccino
cobblemon.species.minccino.desc1: The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.
cobblemon.species.cinccino.name: Cinccino
cobblemon.species.cinccino.desc1: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won’t tolerate even a speck of the stuff.
cobblemon.species.gothita.name: Gothita
cobblemon.species.gothita.desc1: Though they’re still only babies, there’s psychic power stored in their ribbonlike feelers, and sometimes they use that power to fight.
cobblemon.species.gothorita.name: Gothorita
cobblemon.species.gothorita.desc1: It’s said that when stars shine in the night sky, this Pokémon will spirit away sleeping children. Some call it the Witch of Punishment.
cobblemon.species.gothitelle.name: Gothitelle
cobblemon.species.gothitelle.desc1: It has tremendous psychic power, but it dislikes conflict. It’s also able to predict the future based on the movement of the stars.
cobblemon.species.solosis.name: Solosis
cobblemon.species.solosis.desc1: It communicates with others telepathically. Its body is encapsulated in liquid, but if it takes a heavy blow, the liquid will leak out.
cobblemon.species.duosion.name: Duosion
cobblemon.species.duosion.desc1: Its psychic power can supposedly cover a range of more than half a mile—but only if its two brains can agree with each other.
cobblemon.species.reuniclus.name: Reuniclus
cobblemon.species.reuniclus.desc1: While it could use its psychic abilities in battle, this Pokémon prefers to swing its powerful arms around to beat opponents into submission.
cobblemon.species.ducklett.name: Ducklett
cobblemon.species.swanna.name: Swanna
cobblemon.species.vanillite.name: Vanillite
cobblemon.species.vanillite.desc1: Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.
cobblemon.species.vanillish.name: Vanillish
cobblemon.species.vanillish.desc1: By drinking pure water, it grows its icy body. This Pokémon can be hard to find on days with warm, sunny weather.
cobblemon.species.vanilluxe.name: Vanilluxe
cobblemon.species.vanilluxe.desc1: When its anger reaches a breaking point, this Pokémon unleashes a fierce blizzard that freezes every creature around it, be they friend or foe.
cobblemon.species.deerling.name: Deerling
cobblemon.species.sawsbuck.name: Sawsbuck
cobblemon.species.emolga.name: Emolga
cobblemon.species.emolga.desc1: As Emolga flutters through the air, it crackles with electricity. This Pokémon is cute, but it can cause a lot of trouble.
cobblemon.species.karrablast.name: Karrablast
cobblemon.species.karrablast.desc1: Its strange physiology reacts to electrical energy in interesting ways. The presence of a Shelmet will cause this Pokémon to evolve.
cobblemon.species.escavalier.name: Escavalier
cobblemon.species.escavalier.desc1: They use shells they’ve stolen from Shelmet to arm and protect themselves. They’re very popular Pokémon in the Galar region.
cobblemon.species.foongus.name: Foongus
cobblemon.species.foongus.desc1: No one knows what the Poké Ball–like pattern on Foongus means or why Foongus has it.
cobblemon.species.amoonguss.name: Amoonguss
cobblemon.species.amoonguss.desc1: This Pokémon puffs poisonous spores at its foes. If the spores aren’t washed off quickly, they’ll grow into mushrooms wherever they land.
cobblemon.species.frillish.name: Frillish
cobblemon.species.frillish.desc1: It envelops its prey in its veillike arms and draws it down to the deeps, five miles below the ocean’s surface.
cobblemon.species.jellicent.name: Jellicent
cobblemon.species.jellicent.desc1: Most of this Pokémon’s body composition is identical to sea water. It makes sunken ships its lair.
cobblemon.species.alomomola.name: Alomomola
cobblemon.species.joltik.name: Joltik
cobblemon.species.joltik.desc1: Joltik can be found clinging to other Pokémon. It’s soaking up static electricity because it can’t produce a charge on its own.
cobblemon.species.galvantula.name: Galvantula
cobblemon.species.galvantula.desc1: It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.
cobblemon.species.ferroseed.name: Ferroseed
cobblemon.species.ferroseed.desc1: It defends itself by launching spikes, but its aim isn’t very good at first. Only after a lot of practice will it improve.
cobblemon.species.ferrothorn.name: Ferrothorn
cobblemon.species.ferrothorn.desc1: This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across rocks, and then uses the tips of its feelers to absorb the nutrients it finds within the stone.
cobblemon.species.klink.name: Klink
cobblemon.species.klink.desc1: The two minigears that compose this Pokémon are closer than twins. They mesh well only with each other.
cobblemon.species.klang.name: Klang
cobblemon.species.klang.desc1: When Klang goes all out, the minigear links up perfectly with the outer part of the big gear, and this Pokémon’s rotation speed increases sharply.
cobblemon.species.klinklang.name: Klinklang
cobblemon.species.klinklang.desc1: From its spikes, it launches powerful blasts of electricity. Its red core contains an enormous amount of energy.
cobblemon.species.tynamo.name: Tynamo
cobblemon.species.eelektrik.name: Eelektrik
cobblemon.species.eelektross.name: Eelektross
cobblemon.species.elgyem.name: Elgyem
cobblemon.species.elgyem.desc1: If this Pokémon stands near a TV, strange scenery will appear on the screen. That scenery is said to be from its home.
cobblemon.species.beheeyem.name: Beheeyem
cobblemon.species.beheeyem.desc1: Whenever a Beheeyem visits a farm, a Dubwool mysteriously disappears.
cobblemon.species.litwick.name: Litwick
cobblemon.species.litwick.desc1: The flame on its head keeps its body slightly warm. This Pokémon takes lost children by the hand to guide them to the spirit world.
cobblemon.species.lampent.name: Lampent
cobblemon.species.lampent.desc1: This Pokémon appears just before someone passes away, so it’s feared as an emissary of death.
cobblemon.species.chandelure.name: Chandelure
cobblemon.species.chandelure.desc1: This Pokémon haunts dilapidated mansions. It sways its arms to hypnotize opponents with the ominous dancing of its flames.
cobblemon.species.axew.name: Axew
cobblemon.species.axew.desc1: These Pokémon nest in the ground and use their tusks to crush hard berries. Crushing berries is also how they test each other’s strength.
cobblemon.species.fraxure.name: Fraxure
cobblemon.species.fraxure.desc1: After battle, this Pokémon carefully sharpens its tusks on river rocks. It needs to take care of its tusks—if one breaks, it will never grow back.
cobblemon.species.haxorus.name: Haxorus
cobblemon.species.haxorus.desc1: Its resilient tusks are its pride and joy. It licks up dirt to take in the minerals it needs to keep its tusks in top condition.
cobblemon.species.cubchoo.name: Cubchoo
cobblemon.species.cubchoo.desc1: When this Pokémon is in good health, its snot becomes thicker and stickier. It will smear its snot on anyone it doesn’t like.
cobblemon.species.beartic.name: Beartic
cobblemon.species.beartic.desc1: It swims through frigid seas, searching for prey. From its frozen breath, it forms icy fangs that are harder than steel.
cobblemon.species.cryogonal.name: Cryogonal
cobblemon.species.cryogonal.desc1: With its icy chains, Cryogonal freezes those it encounters. It then takes its victims away to somewhere unknown.
cobblemon.species.shelmet.name: Shelmet
cobblemon.species.shelmet.desc1: When attacked, it tightly shuts the lid of its shell. This reaction fails to protect it from Karrablast, however, because they can still get into the shell.
cobblemon.species.accelgor.name: Accelgor
cobblemon.species.accelgor.desc1: It moves with blinding speed and lobs poison at foes. Featuring Accelgor as a main character is a surefire way to make a movie or comic popular.
cobblemon.species.stunfisk.name: Stunfisk
cobblemon.species.stunfisk.desc1: Thanks to bacteria that lived in the mud flats with it, this Pokémon developed the organs it uses to generate electricity.
cobblemon.species.mienfoo.name: Mienfoo
cobblemon.species.mienfoo.desc1: In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo can chop with its arms more than 100 times.
cobblemon.species.mienshao.name: Mienshao
cobblemon.species.mienshao.desc1: When Mienshao comes across a truly challenging opponent, it will lighten itself by biting off the fur on its arms.
cobblemon.species.druddigon.name: Druddigon
cobblemon.species.druddigon.desc1: Druddigon lives in caves, but it never skips sunbathing—it won’t be able to move if its body gets too cold.
cobblemon.species.golett.name: Golett
cobblemon.species.golett.desc1: They were sculpted from clay in ancient times. No one knows why, but some of them are driven to continually line up boulders.
cobblemon.species.golurk.name: Golurk
cobblemon.species.golurk.desc1: Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.
cobblemon.species.pawniard.name: Pawniard
cobblemon.species.pawniard.desc1: It uses river stones to maintain the cutting edges of the blades covering its body. These sharpened blades allow it to bring down opponents.
cobblemon.species.bisharp.name: Bisharp
cobblemon.species.bisharp.desc1: It’s accompanied by a large retinue of Pawniard. Bisharp keeps a keen eye on its minions, ensuring none of them even think of double-crossing it.
cobblemon.species.bouffalant.name: Bouffalant
cobblemon.species.bouffalant.desc1: These Pokémon can crush a car with no more than a headbutt. Bouffalant with more hair on their heads hold higher positions within the herd.
cobblemon.species.rufflet.name: Rufflet
cobblemon.species.rufflet.desc1: If it spies a strong Pokémon, Rufflet can’t resist challenging it to a battle. But if Rufflet loses, it starts bawling.
cobblemon.species.braviary.name: Braviary
cobblemon.species.braviary.desc1: Known for its bravery and pride, this majestic Pokémon is often seen as a motif for various kinds of emblems.
cobblemon.species.vullaby.name: Vullaby
cobblemon.species.vullaby.desc1: It wears a bone to protect its rear. It often squabbles with others of its kind over particularly comfy bones.
cobblemon.species.mandibuzz.name: Mandibuzz
cobblemon.species.mandibuzz.desc1: Although it’s a bit of a ruffian, this Pokémon will take lost Vullaby under its wing and care for them till they’re ready to leave the nest.
cobblemon.species.heatmor.name: Heatmor
cobblemon.species.heatmor.desc1: There’s a hole in its tail that allows it to draw in the air it needs to keep its fire burning. If the hole gets blocked, this Pokémon will fall ill.
cobblemon.species.durant.name: Durant
cobblemon.species.durant.desc1: They lay their eggs deep inside their nests. When attacked by Heatmor, they retaliate using their massive mandibles.
cobblemon.species.deino.name: Deino
cobblemon.species.deino.desc1: When it encounters something, its first urge is usually to bite it. If it likes what it tastes, it will commit the associated scent to memory.
cobblemon.species.zweilous.name: Zweilous
cobblemon.species.zweilous.desc1: While hunting for prey, Zweilous wanders its territory, its two heads often bickering over which way to go.
cobblemon.species.hydreigon.name: Hydreigon
cobblemon.species.hydreigon.desc1: There are a slew of stories about villages that were destroyed by Hydreigon. It bites anything that moves.
cobblemon.species.larvesta.name: Larvesta
cobblemon.species.larvesta.desc1: The people of ancient times believed that Larvesta fell from the sun.
cobblemon.species.volcarona.name: Volcarona
cobblemon.species.volcarona.desc1: Volcarona scatters burning scales. Some say it does this to start fires. Others say it’s trying to rescue those that suffer in the cold.
cobblemon.species.cobalion.name: Cobalion
cobblemon.species.cobalion.desc1: This Pokémon appears in a legend alongside Terrakion and Virizion, fighting against humans in defense of the Unova region’s Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.terrakion.name: Terrakion
cobblemon.species.terrakion.desc1: It has phenomenal power. It will mercilessly crush anyone or anything that bullies small Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.virizion.name: Virizion
cobblemon.species.virizion.desc1: A legend tells of this Pokémon working together with Cobalion and Terrakion to protect the Pokémon of the Unova region.
cobblemon.species.tornadus.name: Tornadus
cobblemon.species.thundurus.name: Thundurus
cobblemon.species.reshiram.name: Reshiram
cobblemon.species.reshiram.desc1: Flames spew from its tail as it flies through the sky like a jet airplane. It’s said that this Pokémon will scorch the world.
cobblemon.species.zekrom.name: Zekrom
cobblemon.species.zekrom.desc1: When the interior part of its tail spins like a motor, Zekrom can generate many bolts of lightning to blast its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.landorus.name: Landorus
cobblemon.species.kyurem.name: Kyurem
cobblemon.species.kyurem.desc1: Dwelling within it is a power even greater than that of Reshiram or Zekrom, but the extreme cold keeps that power bound.
cobblemon.species.keldeo.name: Keldeo
cobblemon.species.keldeo.desc1: Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion taught this Pokémon how to fight. It dashes across the world, seeking more opportunities to further its training.
cobblemon.species.meloetta.name: Meloetta
cobblemon.species.genesect.name: Genesect
cobblemon.species.chespin.name: Chespin
cobblemon.species.quilladin.name: Quilladin
cobblemon.species.chesnaught.name: Chesnaught
cobblemon.species.fennekin.name: Fennekin
cobblemon.species.braixen.name: Braixen
cobblemon.species.delphox.name: Delphox
cobblemon.species.froakie.name: Froakie
cobblemon.species.frogadier.name: Frogadier
cobblemon.species.greninja.name: Greninja
cobblemon.species.bunnelby.name: Bunnelby
cobblemon.species.bunnelby.desc1: It excels at digging holes. Using its ears, it can dig a nest 33 feet deep in one night.
cobblemon.species.diggersby.name: Diggersby
cobblemon.species.diggersby.desc1: With power equal to an excavator, it can dig through dense bedrock. It’s a huge help during tunnel construction.
cobblemon.species.fletchling.name: Fletchling
cobblemon.species.fletchling.desc1: Its melodious cries are actually warnings. Fletchling will mercilessly peck at anything that enters its territory.
cobblemon.species.fletchinder.name: Fletchinder
cobblemon.species.fletchinder.desc1: Fletchinder launches embers into the den of its prey. When the prey comes leaping out, Fletchinder’s sharp talons finish it off.
cobblemon.species.talonflame.name: Talonflame
cobblemon.species.talonflame.desc1: Talonflame mainly preys upon other bird Pokémon. To intimidate opponents, it sends embers spewing from gaps between its feathers.
cobblemon.species.scatterbug.name: Scatterbug
cobblemon.species.spewpa.name: Spewpa
cobblemon.species.vivillon.name: Vivillon
cobblemon.species.litleo.name: Litleo
cobblemon.species.pyroar.name: Pyroar
cobblemon.species.flabebe.name: Flabébé
cobblemon.species.floette.name: Floette
cobblemon.species.florges.name: Florges
cobblemon.species.skiddo.name: Skiddo
cobblemon.species.gogoat.name: Gogoat
cobblemon.species.pancham.name: Pancham
cobblemon.species.pancham.desc1: It chooses a Pangoro as its master and then imitates its master’s actions. This is how it learns to battle and hunt for prey.
cobblemon.species.pangoro.name: Pangoro
cobblemon.species.pangoro.desc1: This Pokémon is quick to anger, and it has no problem using its prodigious strength to get its way. It lives for duels against Obstagoon.
cobblemon.species.furfrou.name: Furfrou
cobblemon.species.espurr.name: Espurr
cobblemon.species.espurr.desc1: Though Espurr’s expression never changes, behind that blank stare is an intense struggle to contain its devastating psychic power.
cobblemon.species.meowstic.name: Meowstic
cobblemon.species.meowstic.desc1: Revealing the eyelike patterns on the insides of its ears will unleash its psychic powers. It normally keeps the patterns hidden, however.
cobblemon.species.honedge.name: Honedge
cobblemon.species.honedge.desc1: Honedge’s soul once belonged to a person who was killed a long time ago by the sword that makes up Honedge’s body.
cobblemon.species.doublade.name: Doublade
cobblemon.species.doublade.desc1: Honedge evolves into twins. The two blades rub together to emit a metallic sound that unnerves opponents.
cobblemon.species.aegislash.name: Aegislash
cobblemon.species.aegislash.desc1: In this defensive stance, Aegislash uses its steel body and a force field of spectral power to reduce the damage of any attack.
cobblemon.species.spritzee.name: Spritzee
cobblemon.species.spritzee.desc1: A scent pouch within this Pokémon’s body allows it to create various scents. A change in its diet will alter the fragrance it produces.
cobblemon.species.aromatisse.name: Aromatisse
cobblemon.species.aromatisse.desc1: The scent that constantly emits from its fur is so powerful that this Pokémon’s companions will eventually lose their sense of smell.
cobblemon.species.swirlix.name: Swirlix
cobblemon.species.swirlix.desc1: It eats its own weight in sugar every day. If it doesn’t get enough sugar, it becomes incredibly grumpy.
cobblemon.species.slurpuff.name: Slurpuff
cobblemon.species.slurpuff.desc1: By taking in a person’s scent, it can sniff out their mental and physical condition. It’s hoped that this skill will have many medical applications.
cobblemon.species.inkay.name: Inkay
cobblemon.species.inkay.desc1: It spins while making its luminescent spots flash. These spots allow it to communicate with others by using different patterns of light.
cobblemon.species.malamar.name: Malamar
cobblemon.species.malamar.desc1: Gazing at its luminescent spots will quickly induce a hypnotic state, putting the observer under Malamar’s control.
cobblemon.species.binacle.name: Binacle
cobblemon.species.binacle.desc1: After two Binacle find a suitably sized rock, they adhere themselves to it and live together. They cooperate to gather food during high tide.
cobblemon.species.barbaracle.name: Barbaracle
cobblemon.species.barbaracle.desc1: Seven Binacle come together to form one Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head gives orders to those serving as the limbs.
cobblemon.species.skrelp.name: Skrelp
cobblemon.species.skrelp.desc1: It drifts in the ocean, blending in with floating seaweed. When other Pokémon come to feast on the seaweed, Skrelp feasts on them instead.
cobblemon.species.dragalge.name: Dragalge
cobblemon.species.dragalge.desc1: Dragalge uses a poisonous liquid capable of corroding metal to send tankers that enter its territory to the bottom of the sea.
cobblemon.species.clauncher.name: Clauncher
cobblemon.species.clauncher.desc1: Clauncher’s claws can fall off during battle, but they’ll regenerate. The meat inside the claws is popular as a delicacy in Galar.
cobblemon.species.clawitzer.name: Clawitzer
cobblemon.species.clawitzer.desc1: After using the feelers on its oversized claw to detect the location of prey, Clawitzer launches a cannonball of water at its target.
cobblemon.species.helioptile.name: Helioptile
cobblemon.species.helioptile.desc1: When spread, the frills on its head act like solar panels, generating the power behind this Pokémon’s electric moves.
cobblemon.species.heliolisk.name: Heliolisk
cobblemon.species.heliolisk.desc1: A now-vanished desert culture treasured these Pokémon. Appropriately, when Heliolisk came to the Galar region, treasure came with them.
cobblemon.species.tyrunt.name: Tyrunt
cobblemon.species.tyrunt.desc1: This is an ancient Pokémon, revived in modern times. It has a violent disposition, and it’ll tear apart anything it gets between its hefty jaws.
cobblemon.species.tyrantrum.name: Tyrantrum
cobblemon.species.tyrantrum.desc1: This Pokémon is from about 100,000,000 years ago. It has the presence of a king, vicious but magnificent.
cobblemon.species.amaura.name: Amaura
cobblemon.species.amaura.desc1: This Pokémon was successfully restored from a fossil. In the past, it lived with others of its kind in cold lands where there were fewer predators.
cobblemon.species.aurorus.name: Aurorus
cobblemon.species.aurorus.desc1: Aurorus was restored from a fossil. It’s said that when this Pokémon howls, auroras appear in the night sky.
cobblemon.species.sylveon.name: Sylveon
cobblemon.species.sylveon.desc1: By releasing enmity-erasing waves from its ribbonlike feelers, Sylveon stops any conflict.
cobblemon.species.hawlucha.name: Hawlucha
cobblemon.species.hawlucha.desc1: It drives its opponents to exhaustion with its agile maneuvers, then ends the fight with a flashy finishing move.
cobblemon.species.dedenne.name: Dedenne
cobblemon.species.dedenne.desc1: A Dedenne’s whiskers pick up electrical waves other Dedenne send out. These Pokémon share locations of food or electricity with one another.
cobblemon.species.carbink.name: Carbink
cobblemon.species.carbink.desc1: When beset by attackers, Carbink wipes them all out by firing high-energy beams from the gems embedded in its body.
cobblemon.species.goomy.name: Goomy
cobblemon.species.goomy.desc1: Because most of its body is water, it will dry up if the weather becomes too arid. It’s considered the weakest dragon Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.sliggoo.name: Sliggoo
cobblemon.species.sliggoo.desc1: Although this Pokémon isn’t very strong, its body is coated in a caustic slime that can melt through anything, so predators steer clear of it.
cobblemon.species.goodra.name: Goodra
cobblemon.species.goodra.desc1: Sometimes it misunderstands instructions and appears dazed or bewildered. Many Trainers don’t mind, finding this behavior to be adorable.
cobblemon.species.klefki.name: Klefki
cobblemon.species.klefki.desc1: This Pokémon is constantly collecting keys. Entrust a Klefki with important keys, and the Pokémon will protect them no matter what.
cobblemon.species.phantump.name: Phantump
cobblemon.species.phantump.desc1: After a lost child perished in the forest, their spirit possessed a tree stump, causing the spirit’s rebirth as this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.trevenant.name: Trevenant
cobblemon.species.trevenant.desc1: People fear it due to a belief that it devours any who try to cut down trees in its forest, but to the Pokémon it shares its woods with, it’s kind.
cobblemon.species.pumpkaboo.name: Pumpkaboo
cobblemon.species.pumpkaboo.desc1: Spirits that wander this world are placed into Pumpkaboo’s body. They’re then moved on to the afterlife.
cobblemon.species.gourgeist.name: Gourgeist
cobblemon.species.gourgeist.desc1: Eerie cries emanate from its body in the dead of night. The sounds are said to be the wails of spirits who are suffering in the afterlife.
cobblemon.species.bergmite.name: Bergmite
cobblemon.species.bergmite.desc1: They chill the air around them to −150 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing the water in the air into ice that they use as armor.
cobblemon.species.avalugg.name: Avalugg
cobblemon.species.avalugg.desc1: At high latitudes, this Pokémon can be found with clusters of Bergmite on its back as it swims among the icebergs.
cobblemon.species.noibat.name: Noibat
cobblemon.species.noibat.desc1: After nightfall, they emerge from the caves they nest in during the day. Using their ultrasonic waves, they go on the hunt for ripened fruit.
cobblemon.species.noivern.name: Noivern
cobblemon.species.noivern.desc1: Aggressive and cruel, this Pokémon will ruthlessly torment enemies that are helpless in the dark.
cobblemon.species.xerneas.name: Xerneas
cobblemon.species.yveltal.name: Yveltal
cobblemon.species.zygarde.name: Zygarde
cobblemon.species.diancie.name: Diancie
cobblemon.species.hoopa.name: Hoopa
cobblemon.species.volcanion.name: Volcanion
cobblemon.species.rowlet.name: Rowlet
cobblemon.species.rowlet.desc1: At a distance, it launches its sharp feathers while flying about. If the enemy gets too close, Rowlet switches tactics and delivers vicious kicks.
cobblemon.species.dartrix.name: Dartrix
cobblemon.species.dartrix.desc1: It throws one knifelike feather after another at its enemies, and each one precisely strikes a weak point. These feathers are known as blade quills.
cobblemon.species.decidueye.name: Decidueye
cobblemon.species.decidueye.desc1: As if wielding a bow, it launches the arrow quills hidden among the feathers of its wings. Decidueye’s shots never miss.
cobblemon.species.litten.name: Litten
cobblemon.species.litten.desc1: It spends even the smallest amount of downtime grooming its fur with its tongue. Loose fur gathers in its stomach and serves as fuel for fiery moves.
cobblemon.species.torracat.name: Torracat
cobblemon.species.torracat.desc1: In the midst of battle, the fire pouch on Torracat’s neck rings like a bell and produces stronger flames than usual.
cobblemon.species.incineroar.name: Incineroar
cobblemon.species.incineroar.desc1: It excels at violent, no-holds-barred battles. The temperature of the flames that issue from its navel exceeds 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.popplio.name: Popplio
cobblemon.species.popplio.desc1: It creates special bouncy balloons to send at its opponents. When the balloons pop, the sheer force of their bursting is what deals damage.
cobblemon.species.brionne.name: Brionne
cobblemon.species.brionne.desc1: As if dancing, it artfully dodges the attacks of its enemies. All the while, it’s busy forming a bunch of balloons to overwhelm its foes.
cobblemon.species.primarina.name: Primarina
cobblemon.species.primarina.desc1: With its mouth, it makes sonic waves that sound like beautiful singing. It uses the sonic waves to control its water balloons.
cobblemon.species.pikipek.name: Pikipek
cobblemon.species.trumbeak.name: Trumbeak
cobblemon.species.toucannon.name: Toucannon
cobblemon.species.yungoos.name: Yungoos
cobblemon.species.gumshoos.name: Gumshoos
cobblemon.species.grubbin.name: Grubbin
cobblemon.species.grubbin.desc1: Its natural enemies, like Rookidee, may flee rather than risk getting caught in its large mandibles that can snap thick tree branches.
cobblemon.species.charjabug.name: Charjabug
cobblemon.species.charjabug.desc1: While its durable shell protects it from attacks, Charjabug strikes at enemies with jolts of electricity discharged from the tips of its jaws.
cobblemon.species.vikavolt.name: Vikavolt
cobblemon.species.vikavolt.desc1: It builds up electricity in its abdomen, focuses it through its jaws, and then fires the electricity off in concentrated beams.
cobblemon.species.crabrawler.name: Crabrawler
cobblemon.species.crabominable.name: Crabominable
cobblemon.species.oricorio.name: Oricorio
cobblemon.species.cutiefly.name: Cutiefly
cobblemon.species.cutiefly.desc1: Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. You can find Cutiefly hovering around Gossifleur, trying to get some of Gossifleur’s pollen.
cobblemon.species.ribombee.name: Ribombee
cobblemon.species.ribombee.desc1: It makes pollen puffs from pollen and nectar. The puffs’ effects depend on the type of ingredients and how much of each one is used.
cobblemon.species.rockruff.name: Rockruff
cobblemon.species.rockruff.desc1: This Pokémon can bond very strongly with its Trainer, but it also has a habit of biting. Raising a Rockruff for a long time can be challenging.
cobblemon.species.lycanroc.name: Lycanroc
cobblemon.species.lycanroc.desc1: This Lycanroc is calm and cautious. The rocks jutting from its mane are razor sharp.
cobblemon.species.wishiwashi.name: Wishiwashi
cobblemon.species.wishiwashi.desc1: Individually, they’re incredibly weak. It’s by gathering up into schools that they’re able to confront opponents.
cobblemon.species.mareanie.name: Mareanie
cobblemon.species.mareanie.desc1: The first symptom of its sting is numbness. The next is an itching sensation so intense that it’s impossible to resist the urge to claw at your skin.
cobblemon.species.toxapex.name: Toxapex
cobblemon.species.toxapex.desc1: To survive in the cold waters of Galar, this Pokémon forms a dome with its legs, enclosing its body so it can capture its own body heat.
cobblemon.species.mudbray.name: Mudbray
cobblemon.species.mudbray.desc1: Loads weighing up to 50 times as much as its own body weight pose no issue for this Pokémon. It’s skilled at making use of mud.
cobblemon.species.mudsdale.name: Mudsdale
cobblemon.species.mudsdale.desc1: Mud that hardens around a Mudsdale’s legs sets harder than stone. It’s so hard that it allows this Pokémon to scrap a truck with a single kick.
cobblemon.species.dewpider.name: Dewpider
cobblemon.species.dewpider.desc1: It forms a water bubble at the rear of its body and then covers its head with it. Meeting another Dewpider means comparing water-bubble sizes.
cobblemon.species.araquanid.name: Araquanid
cobblemon.species.araquanid.desc1: It launches water bubbles with its legs, drowning prey within the bubbles. This Pokémon can then take its time to savor its meal.
cobblemon.species.fomantis.name: Fomantis
cobblemon.species.fomantis.desc1: When bathed in sunlight, this Pokémon emits a pleasantly sweet scent, which causes bug Pokémon to gather around it.
cobblemon.species.lurantis.name: Lurantis
cobblemon.species.lurantis.desc1: This Pokémon resembles a beautiful flower. A properly raised Lurantis will have gorgeous, brilliant colors.
cobblemon.species.morelull.name: Morelull
cobblemon.species.morelull.desc1: Pokémon living in the forest eat the delicious caps on Morelull’s head. The caps regrow overnight.
cobblemon.species.shiinotic.name: Shiinotic
cobblemon.species.shiinotic.desc1: Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing, it drains their vitality with its fingertips.
cobblemon.species.salandit.name: Salandit
cobblemon.species.salandit.desc1: Its venom sacs produce a fluid that this Pokémon then heats up with the flame in its tail. This process creates Salandit’s poisonous gas.
cobblemon.species.salazzle.name: Salazzle
cobblemon.species.salazzle.desc1: Only female Salazzle exist. They emit a gas laden with pheromones to captivate male Salandit.
cobblemon.species.stufful.name: Stufful
cobblemon.species.stufful.desc1: Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly reaching out to touch this Pokémon could result in painful retaliation.
cobblemon.species.bewear.name: Bewear
cobblemon.species.bewear.desc1: Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is dangerous—it could easily shatter your bones.
cobblemon.species.bounsweet.name: Bounsweet
cobblemon.species.bounsweet.desc1: Its body gives off a sweet, fruity scent that is extremely appetizing to bird Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.steenee.name: Steenee
cobblemon.species.steenee.desc1: As it twirls like a dancer, a sweet smell spreads out around it. Anyone who inhales the scent will feel a surge of happiness.
cobblemon.species.tsareena.name: Tsareena
cobblemon.species.tsareena.desc1: This feared Pokémon has long, slender legs and a cruel heart. It shows no mercy as it stomps on its opponents.
cobblemon.species.comfey.name: Comfey
cobblemon.species.comfey.desc1: Comfey picks flowers with its vine and decorates itself with them. For some reason, flowers won’t wither once they’re attached to a Comfey.
cobblemon.species.oranguru.name: Oranguru
cobblemon.species.oranguru.desc1: With waves of its fan—made from leaves and its own fur—Oranguru skillfully gives instructions to other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.passimian.name: Passimian
cobblemon.species.passimian.desc1: Displaying amazing teamwork, they follow the orders of their boss as they all help out in the search for their favorite berries.
cobblemon.species.wimpod.name: Wimpod
cobblemon.species.wimpod.desc1: It’s nature’s cleaner—it eats anything and everything, including garbage and rotten things. The ground near its nest is always clean.
cobblemon.species.golisopod.name: Golisopod
cobblemon.species.golisopod.desc1: It will do anything to win, taking advantage of every opening and finishing opponents off with the small claws on its front legs.
cobblemon.species.sandygast.name: Sandygast
cobblemon.species.sandygast.desc1: Grudges of the dead have possessed a mound of sand and become a Pokémon. Sandygast is fond of the shovel on its head.
cobblemon.species.palossand.name: Palossand
cobblemon.species.palossand.desc1: Palossand is known as the Beach Nightmare. It pulls its prey down into the sand by controlling the sand itself, and then it sucks out their souls.
cobblemon.species.pyukumuku.name: Pyukumuku
cobblemon.species.pyukumuku.desc1: It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means to punch them.
cobblemon.species.typenull.name: Type: Null
cobblemon.species.typenull.desc1: Rumor has it that the theft of top-secret research notes led to a new instance of this Pokémon being created in the Galar region.
cobblemon.species.silvally.name: Silvally
cobblemon.species.silvally.desc1: A solid bond of trust between this Pokémon and its Trainer awakened the strength hidden within Silvally. It can change its type at will.
cobblemon.species.minior.name: Minior
cobblemon.species.komala.name: Komala
cobblemon.species.turtonator.name: Turtonator
cobblemon.species.turtonator.desc1: Explosive substances coat the shell on its back. Enemies that dare attack it will be blown away by an immense detonation.
cobblemon.species.togedemaru.name: Togedemaru
cobblemon.species.togedemaru.desc1: With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon. It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.
cobblemon.species.mimikyu.name: Mimikyu
cobblemon.species.mimikyu.desc1: It wears a rag fashioned into a Pikachu costume in an effort to look less scary. Unfortunately, the costume only makes it creepier.
cobblemon.species.bruxish.name: Bruxish
cobblemon.species.drampa.name: Drampa
cobblemon.species.drampa.desc1: The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play with the children living in the towns below.
cobblemon.species.dhelmise.name: Dhelmise
cobblemon.species.dhelmise.desc1: After a piece of seaweed merged with debris from a sunken ship, it was reborn as this ghost Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.jangmoo.name: Jangmo-o
cobblemon.species.jangmoo.desc1: They learn to fight by smashing their head scales together. The dueling strengthens both their skills and their spirits.
cobblemon.species.hakamoo.name: Hakamo-o
cobblemon.species.hakamoo.desc1: The scaleless, scarred parts of its body are signs of its strength. It shows them off to defeated opponents.
cobblemon.species.kommoo.name: Kommo-o
cobblemon.species.kommoo.desc1: It clatters its tail scales to unnerve opponents. This Pokémon will battle only those who stand steadfast in the face of this display.
cobblemon.species.tapukoko.name: Tapu Koko
cobblemon.species.tapulele.name: Tapu Lele
cobblemon.species.tapubulu.name: Tapu Bulu
cobblemon.species.tapufini.name: Tapu Fini
cobblemon.species.cosmog.name: Cosmog
cobblemon.species.cosmog.desc1: This Pokémon came from another universe. Its gaseous body is so light that even a gentle breeze can blow it away.
cobblemon.species.cosmoem.name: Cosmoem
cobblemon.species.cosmoem.desc1: The absorption of starlight fuels this Pokémon’s growth. The shell that encases it is harder than any known material.
cobblemon.species.solgaleo.name: Solgaleo
cobblemon.species.solgaleo.desc1: When light radiates from its body, this Pokémon could almost appear to be the sun. It will dispel any darkness and light up the world.
cobblemon.species.lunala.name: Lunala
cobblemon.species.lunala.desc1: Known as the Beast That Calls the Moon, this Pokémon lives by taking in any and all light and converting it into its own energy.
cobblemon.species.nihilego.name: Nihilego
cobblemon.species.buzzwole.name: Buzzwole
cobblemon.species.pheromosa.name: Pheromosa
cobblemon.species.xurkitree.name: Xurkitree
cobblemon.species.celesteela.name: Celesteela
cobblemon.species.kartana.name: Kartana
cobblemon.species.guzzlord.name: Guzzlord
cobblemon.species.necrozma.name: Necrozma
cobblemon.species.necrozma.desc1: It survives by absorbing light. After a long time spent slumbering underground, impurities accumulated within it, causing its body to darken.
cobblemon.species.magearna.name: Magearna
cobblemon.species.marshadow.name: Marshadow
cobblemon.species.marshadow.desc1: By slipping into the shadow of a martial arts master and copying their movements, this Pokémon learned the ultimate techniques.
cobblemon.species.poipole.name: Poipole
cobblemon.species.naganadel.name: Naganadel
cobblemon.species.stakataka.name: Stakataka
cobblemon.species.blacephalon.name: Blacephalon
cobblemon.species.zeraora.name: Zeraora
cobblemon.species.zeraora.desc1: It runs as fast as lightning strikes, shredding its opponents with its high-voltage claws.
cobblemon.species.meltan.name: Meltan
cobblemon.species.meltan.desc1: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.
cobblemon.species.melmetal.name: Melmetal
cobblemon.species.melmetal.desc1: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.
cobblemon.species.grookey.name: Grookey
cobblemon.species.grookey.desc1: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.
cobblemon.species.thwackey.name: Thwackey
cobblemon.species.thwackey.desc1: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.
cobblemon.species.rillaboom.name: Rillaboom
cobblemon.species.rillaboom.desc1: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.
cobblemon.species.scorbunny.name: Scorbunny
cobblemon.species.scorbunny.desc1: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon’s body. Once that happens, it’s ready to fight at full power.
cobblemon.species.raboot.name: Raboot
cobblemon.species.raboot.desc1: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.
cobblemon.species.cinderace.name: Cinderace
cobblemon.species.cinderace.desc1: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.
cobblemon.species.sobble.name: Sobble
cobblemon.species.sobble.desc1: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won’t be able to resist weeping.
cobblemon.species.drizzile.name: Drizzile
cobblemon.species.drizzile.desc1: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.
cobblemon.species.inteleon.name: Inteleon
cobblemon.species.inteleon.desc1: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.
cobblemon.species.skwovet.name: Skwovet
cobblemon.species.skwovet.desc1: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.
cobblemon.species.greedent.name: Greedent
cobblemon.species.greedent.desc1: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.
cobblemon.species.rookidee.name: Rookidee
cobblemon.species.rookidee.desc1: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle—even a defeat increases its strength a bit.
cobblemon.species.corvisquire.name: Corvisquire
cobblemon.species.corvisquire.desc1: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.
cobblemon.species.corviknight.name: Corviknight
cobblemon.species.corviknight.desc1: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.
cobblemon.species.blipbug.name: Blipbug
cobblemon.species.blipbug.desc1: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn’t.
cobblemon.species.dottler.name: Dottler
cobblemon.species.dottler.desc1: It barely moves, but it’s still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.orbeetle.name: Orbeetle
